                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why speaks my father so ungently? This</div>
                     <div class="line">Is the third man that e'er I saw, the first</div>
                     <div class="line">That e'er I sigh'd for: pity move my father</div>
                     <div class="line">To be inclined my way!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">O, if a virgin,</div>
                     <div class="line">And your affection not gone forth, I'll make you</div>
                     <div class="line">The queen of Naples.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Soft, sir! one word more.</div>
                     <p>Aside</p>
                     <div class="line">They are both in either's powers; but this swift business</div>
                     <div class="line">I must uneasy make, lest too light winning</div>
                     <div class="line">Make the prize light.</div>
                     <p>To FERDINAND</p>
                     <div class="line">One word more; I charge thee</div>
                     <div class="line">That thou attend me: thou dost here usurp</div>
                     <div class="line">The name thou owest not; and hast put thyself</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon this island as a spy, to win it</div>
                     <div class="line">From me, the lord on't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">No, as I am a man.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">There's nothing ill can dwell in such a temple:</div>
                     <div class="line">If the ill spirit have so fair a house,</div>
                     <div class="line">Good things will strive to dwell with't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Follow me.</div>
                     <div class="line">Speak not you for him; he's a traitor. Come;</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll manacle thy neck and feet together:</div>
                     <div class="line">Sea-water shalt thou drink; thy food shall be</div>
                     <div class="line">The fresh-brook muscles, wither'd roots and husks</div>
                     <div class="line">Wherein the acorn cradled. Follow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">No;</div>
                     <div class="line">I will resist such entertainment till</div>
                     <div class="line">Mine enemy has more power.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Draws, and is charmed from moving</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">O dear father,</div>
                     <div class="line">Make not too rash a trial of him, for</div>
                     <div class="line">He's gentle and not fearful.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">What? I say,</div>
                     <div class="line">My foot my tutor? Put thy sword up, traitor;</div>
                     <div class="line">Who makest a show but darest not strike, thy conscience</div>
                     <div class="line">Is so possess'd with guilt: come from thy ward,</div>
                     <div class="line">For I can here disarm thee with this stick</div>
                     <div class="line">And make thy weapon drop.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Beseech you, father.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hence! hang not on my garments.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, have pity;</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll be his surety.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Silence! one word more</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall make me chide thee, if not hate thee. What!</div>
                     <div class="line">An advocate for an imposter! hush!</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou think'st there is no more such shapes as he,</div>
                     <div class="line">Having seen but him and Caliban: foolish wench!</div>
                     <div class="line">To the most of men this is a Caliban</div>
                     <div class="line">And they to him are angels.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">My affections</div>
                     <div class="line">Are then most humble; I have no ambition</div>
                     <div class="line">To see a goodlier man.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come on; obey:</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy nerves are in their infancy again</div>
                     <div class="line">And have no vigour in them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">So they are;</div>
                     <div class="line">My spirits, as in a dream, are all bound up.</div>
                     <div class="line">My father's loss, the weakness which I feel,</div>
                     <div class="line">The wreck of all my friends, nor this man's threats,</div>
                     <div class="line">To whom I am subdued, are but light to me,</div>
                     <div class="line">Might I but through my prison once a day</div>
                     <div class="line">Behold this maid: all corners else o' the earth</div>
                     <div class="line">Let liberty make use of; space enough</div>
                     <div class="line">Have I in such a prison.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>                It works.</div>
                     <p>To FERDINAND</p>
                     <div class="line">Come on.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou hast done well, fine Ariel!</div>
                     <p>To FERDINAND</p>
                     <div class="line">Follow me.</div>
                     <p>To ARIEL</p>
                     <div class="line">Hark what thou else shalt do me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Be of comfort;</div>
                     <div class="line">My father's of a better nature, sir,</div>
                     <div class="line">Than he appears by speech: this is unwonted</div>
                     <div class="line">Which now came from him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou shalt be free</div>
                     <div class="line">As mountain winds: but then exactly do</div>
                     <div class="line">All points of my command.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">To the syllable.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, follow. Speak not for him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.4">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  Another part of the island.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  Another part of the island.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  Another part of the island.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, GONZALO,
ADRIAN, FRANCISCO, and others</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Beseech you, sir, be merry; you have cause,</div>
                     <div class="line">So have we all, of joy; for our escape</div>
                     <div class="line">Is much beyond our loss. Our hint of woe</div>
                     <div class="line">Is common; every day some sailor's wife,</div>
                     <div class="line">The masters of some merchant and the merchant</div>
                     <div class="line">Have just our theme of woe; but for the miracle,</div>
                     <div class="line">I mean our preservation, few in millions</div>
                     <div class="line">Can speak like us: then wisely, good sir, weigh</div>
                     <div class="line">Our sorrow with our comfort.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Prithee, peace.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">He receives comfort like cold porridge.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">The visitor will not give him o'er so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Look he's winding up the watch of his wit;</div>
                     <div class="line">by and by it will strike.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">One: tell.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">When every grief is entertain'd that's offer'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">Comes to the entertainer--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">A dollar.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Dolour comes to him, indeed: you</div>
                     <div class="line">have spoken truer than you purposed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">You have taken it wiselier than I meant you should.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Therefore, my lord,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Fie, what a spendthrift is he of his tongue!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">I prithee, spare.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, I have done: but yet,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">He will be talking.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Which, of he or Adrian, for a good</div>
                     <div class="line">wager, first begins to crow?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">The old cock.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">The cockerel.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Done. The wager?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A laughter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">A match!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Though this island seem to be desert,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Ha, ha, ha! So, you're paid.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Uninhabitable and almost inaccessible,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">He could not miss't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">It must needs be of subtle, tender and delicate</div>
                     <div class="line">temperance.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Temperance was a delicate wench.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, and a subtle; as he most learnedly delivered.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">The air breathes upon us here most sweetly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">As if it had lungs and rotten ones.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Or as 'twere perfumed by a fen.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Here is everything advantageous to life.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">True; save means to live.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Of that there's none, or little.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">How lush and lusty the grass looks! how green!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">The ground indeed is tawny.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">With an eye of green in't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">He misses not much.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">No; he doth but mistake the truth totally.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">But the rarity of it is,--which is indeed almost</div>
                     <div class="line">beyond credit,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">As many vouched rarities are.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">That our garments, being, as they were, drenched in</div>
                     <div class="line">the sea, hold notwithstanding their freshness and</div>
                     <div class="line">glosses, being rather new-dyed than stained with</div>
                     <div class="line">salt water.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">If but one of his pockets could speak, would it not</div>
                     <div class="line">say he lies?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, or very falsely pocket up his report</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Methinks our garments are now as fresh as when we</div>
                     <div class="line">put them on first in Afric, at the marriage of</div>
                     <div class="line">the king's fair daughter Claribel to the King of Tunis.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twas a sweet marriage, and we prosper well in our return.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Tunis was never graced before with such a paragon to</div>
                     <div class="line">their queen.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Not since widow Dido's time.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Widow! a pox o' that! How came that widow in?</div>
                     <div class="line">widow Dido!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">What if he had said 'widower AEneas' too? Good Lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">how you take it!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">'Widow Dido' said you? you make me study of that:</div>
                     <div class="line">she was of Carthage, not of Tunis.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">This Tunis, sir, was Carthage.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Carthage?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">I assure you, Carthage.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">His word is more than the miraculous harp; he hath</div>
                     <div class="line">raised the wall and houses too.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What impossible matter will he make easy next?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I think he will carry this island home in his pocket</div>
                     <div class="line">and give it his son for an apple.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And, sowing the kernels of it in the sea, bring</div>
                     <div class="line">forth more islands.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, in good time.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, we were talking that our garments seem now</div>
                     <div class="line">as fresh as when we were at Tunis at the marriage</div>
                     <div class="line">of your daughter, who is now queen.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And the rarest that e'er came there.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Bate, I beseech you, widow Dido.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, widow Dido! ay, widow Dido.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Is not, sir, my doublet as fresh as the first day I</div>
                     <div class="line">wore it? I mean, in a sort.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">That sort was well fished for.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">When I wore it at your daughter's marriage?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">You cram these words into mine ears against</div>
                     <div class="line">The stomach of my sense. Would I had never</div>
                     <div class="line">Married my daughter there! for, coming thence,</div>
                     <div class="line">My son is lost and, in my rate, she too,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who is so far from Italy removed</div>
                     <div class="line">I ne'er again shall see her. O thou mine heir</div>
                     <div class="line">Of Naples and of Milan, what strange fish</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath made his meal on thee?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FRANCISCO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, he may live:</div>
                     <div class="line">I saw him beat the surges under him,</div>
                     <div class="line">And ride upon their backs; he trod the water,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose enmity he flung aside, and breasted</div>
                     <div class="line">The surge most swoln that met him; his bold head</div>
                     <div class="line">'Bove the contentious waves he kept, and oar'd</div>
                     <div class="line">Himself with his good arms in lusty stroke</div>
                     <div class="line">To the shore, that o'er his wave-worn basis bow'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">As stooping to relieve him: I not doubt</div>
                     <div class="line">He came alive to land.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">No, no, he's gone.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, you may thank yourself for this great loss,</div>
                     <div class="line">That would not bless our Europe with your daughter,</div>
                     <div class="line">But rather lose her to an African;</div>
                     <div class="line">Where she at least is banish'd from your eye,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who hath cause to wet the grief on't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Prithee, peace.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">You were kneel'd to and importuned otherwise</div>
                     <div class="line">By all of us, and the fair soul herself</div>
                     <div class="line">Weigh'd between loathness and obedience, at</div>
                     <div class="line">Which end o' the beam should bow. We have lost your</div>
                     <div class="line">son,</div>
                     <div class="line">I fear, for ever: Milan and Naples have</div>
                     <div class="line">More widows in them of this business' making</div>
                     <div class="line">Than we bring men to comfort them:</div>
                     <div class="line">The fault's your own.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">So is the dear'st o' the loss.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord Sebastian,</div>
                     <div class="line">The truth you speak doth lack some gentleness</div>
                     <div class="line">And time to speak it in: you rub the sore,</div>
                     <div class="line">When you should bring the plaster.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Very well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And most chirurgeonly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">It is foul weather in us all, good sir,</div>
                     <div class="line">When you are cloudy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Foul weather?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Very foul.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Had I plantation of this isle, my lord,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">He'ld sow't with nettle-seed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Or docks, or mallows.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">And were the king on't, what would I do?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">'Scape being drunk for want of wine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">I' the commonwealth I would by contraries</div>
                     <div class="line">Execute all things; for no kind of traffic</div>
                     <div class="line">Would I admit; no name of magistrate;</div>
                     <div class="line">Letters should not be known; riches, poverty,</div>
                     <div class="line">And use of service, none; contract, succession,</div>
                     <div class="line">Bourn, bound of land, tilth, vineyard, none;</div>
                     <div class="line">No use of metal, corn, or wine, or oil;</div>
                     <div class="line">No occupation; all men idle, all;</div>
                     <div class="line">And women too, but innocent and pure;</div>
                     <div class="line">No sovereignty;--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet he would be king on't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">The latter end of his commonwealth forgets the</div>
                     <div class="line">beginning.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">All things in common nature should produce</div>
                     <div class="line">Without sweat or endeavour: treason, felony,</div>
                     <div class="line">Sword, pike, knife, gun, or need of any engine,</div>
                     <div class="line">Would I not have; but nature should bring forth,</div>
                     <div class="line">Of its own kind, all foison, all abundance,</div>
                     <div class="line">To feed my innocent people.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">No marrying 'mong his subjects?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">None, man; all idle: whores and knaves.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">I would with such perfection govern, sir,</div>
                     <div class="line">To excel the golden age.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">God save his majesty!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Long live Gonzalo!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">And,--do you mark me, sir?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Prithee, no more: thou dost talk nothing to me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">I do well believe your highness; and</div>
                     <div class="line">did it to minister occasion to these gentlemen,</div>
                     <div class="line">who are of such sensible and nimble lungs that</div>
                     <div class="line">they always use to laugh at nothing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twas you we laughed at.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Who in this kind of merry fooling am nothing</div>
                     <div class="line">to you: so you may continue and laugh at</div>
                     <div class="line">nothing still.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What a blow was there given!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">An it had not fallen flat-long.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">You are gentlemen of brave metal; you would lift</div>
                     <div class="line">the moon out of her sphere, if she would continue</div>
                     <div class="line">in it five weeks without changing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ARIEL, invisible, playing solemn music</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">We would so, and then go a bat-fowling.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, good my lord, be not angry.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">No, I warrant you; I will not adventure</div>
                     <div class="line">my discretion so weakly. Will you laugh</div>
                     <div class="line">me asleep, for I am very heavy?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Go sleep, and hear us.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>All sleep except ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, and ANTONIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, all so soon asleep! I wish mine eyes</div>
                     <div class="line">Would, with themselves, shut up my thoughts: I find</div>
                     <div class="line">They are inclined to do so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Please you, sir,</div>
                     <div class="line">Do not omit the heavy offer of it:</div>
                     <div class="line">It seldom visits sorrow; when it doth,</div>
                     <div class="line">It is a comforter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">We two, my lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">Will guard your person while you take your rest,</div>
                     <div class="line">And watch your safety.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thank you. Wondrous heavy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>ALONSO sleeps. Exit ARIEL</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">What a strange drowsiness possesses them!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">It is the quality o' the climate.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Why</div>
                     <div class="line">Doth it not then our eyelids sink? I find not</div>
                     <div class="line">Myself disposed to sleep.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor I; my spirits are nimble.</div>
                     <div class="line">They fell together all, as by consent;</div>
                     <div class="line">They dropp'd, as by a thunder-stroke. What might,</div>
                     <div class="line">Worthy Sebastian? O, what might?--No more:--</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet me thinks I see it in thy face,</div>
                     <div class="line">What thou shouldst be: the occasion speaks thee, and</div>
                     <div class="line">My strong imagination sees a crown</div>
                     <div class="line">Dropping upon thy head.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">What, art thou waking?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you not hear me speak?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I do; and surely</div>
                     <div class="line">It is a sleepy language and thou speak'st</div>
                     <div class="line">Out of thy sleep. What is it thou didst say?</div>
                     <div class="line">This is a strange repose, to be asleep</div>
                     <div class="line">With eyes wide open; standing, speaking, moving,</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet so fast asleep.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Noble Sebastian,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou let'st thy fortune sleep--die, rather; wink'st</div>
                     <div class="line">Whiles thou art waking.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou dost snore distinctly;</div>
                     <div class="line">There's meaning in thy snores.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I am more serious than my custom: you</div>
                     <div class="line">Must be so too, if heed me; which to do</div>
                     <div class="line">Trebles thee o'er.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, I am standing water.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll teach you how to flow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Do so: to ebb</div>
                     <div class="line">Hereditary sloth instructs me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O,</div>
                     <div class="line">If you but knew how you the purpose cherish</div>
                     <div class="line">Whiles thus you mock it! how, in stripping it,</div>
                     <div class="line">You more invest it! Ebbing men, indeed,</div>
                     <div class="line">Most often do so near the bottom run</div>
                     <div class="line">By their own fear or sloth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Prithee, say on:</div>
                     <div class="line">The setting of thine eye and cheek proclaim</div>
                     <div class="line">A matter from thee, and a birth indeed</div>
                     <div class="line">Which throes thee much to yield.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thus, sir:</div>
                     <div class="line">Although this lord of weak remembrance, this,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who shall be of as little memory</div>
                     <div class="line">When he is earth'd, hath here almost persuade,--</div>
                     <div class="line">For he's a spirit of persuasion, only</div>
                     <div class="line">Professes to persuade,--the king his son's alive,</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis as impossible that he's undrown'd</div>
                     <div class="line">And he that sleeps here swims.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I have no hope</div>
                     <div class="line">That he's undrown'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, out of that 'no hope'</div>
                     <div class="line">What great hope have you! no hope that way is</div>
                     <div class="line">Another way so high a hope that even</div>
                     <div class="line">Ambition cannot pierce a wink beyond,</div>
                     <div class="line">But doubt discovery there. Will you grant with me</div>
                     <div class="line">That Ferdinand is drown'd?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">He's gone.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Then, tell me,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who's the next heir of Naples?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Claribel.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">She that is queen of Tunis; she that dwells</div>
                     <div class="line">Ten leagues beyond man's life; she that from Naples</div>
                     <div class="line">Can have no note, unless the sun were post--</div>
                     <div class="line">The man i' the moon's too slow--till new-born chins</div>
                     <div class="line">Be rough and razorable; she that--from whom?</div>
                     <div class="line">We all were sea-swallow'd, though some cast again,</div>
                     <div class="line">And by that destiny to perform an act</div>
                     <div class="line">Whereof what's past is prologue, what to come</div>
                     <div class="line">In yours and my discharge.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">What stuff is this! how say you?</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis true, my brother's daughter's queen of Tunis;</div>
                     <div class="line">So is she heir of Naples; 'twixt which regions</div>
                     <div class="line">There is some space.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A space whose every cubit</div>
                     <div class="line">Seems to cry out, 'How shall that Claribel</div>
                     <div class="line">Measure us back to Naples? Keep in Tunis,</div>
                     <div class="line">And let Sebastian wake.' Say, this were death</div>
                     <div class="line">That now hath seized them; why, they were no worse</div>
                     <div class="line">Than now they are. There be that can rule Naples</div>
                     <div class="line">As well as he that sleeps; lords that can prate</div>
                     <div class="line">As amply and unnecessarily</div>
                     <div class="line">As this Gonzalo; I myself could make</div>
                     <div class="line">A chough of as deep chat. O, that you bore</div>
                     <div class="line">The mind that I do! what a sleep were this</div>
                     <div class="line">For your advancement! Do you understand me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Methinks I do.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And how does your content</div>
                     <div class="line">Tender your own good fortune?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I remember</div>
                     <div class="line">You did supplant your brother Prospero.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">True:</div>
                     <div class="line">And look how well my garments sit upon me;</div>
                     <div class="line">Much feater than before: my brother's servants</div>
                     <div class="line">Were then my fellows; now they are my men.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">But, for your conscience?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, sir; where lies that? if 'twere a kibe,</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twould put me to my slipper: but I feel not</div>
                     <div class="line">This deity in my bosom: twenty consciences,</div>
                     <div class="line">That stand 'twixt me and Milan, candied be they</div>
                     <div class="line">And melt ere they molest! Here lies your brother,</div>
                     <div class="line">No better than the earth he lies upon,</div>
                     <div class="line">If he were that which now he's like, that's dead;</div>
                     <div class="line">Whom I, with this obedient steel, three inches of it,</div>
                     <div class="line">Can lay to bed for ever; whiles you, doing thus,</div>
                     <div class="line">To the perpetual wink for aye might put</div>
                     <div class="line">This ancient morsel, this Sir Prudence, who</div>
                     <div class="line">Should not upbraid our course. For all the rest,</div>
                     <div class="line">They'll take suggestion as a cat laps milk;</div>
                     <div class="line">They'll tell the clock to any business that</div>
                     <div class="line">We say befits the hour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy case, dear friend,</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall be my precedent; as thou got'st Milan,</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll come by Naples. Draw thy sword: one stroke</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall free thee from the tribute which thou payest;</div>
                     <div class="line">And I the king shall love thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Draw together;</div>
                     <div class="line">And when I rear my hand, do you the like,</div>
                     <div class="line">To fall it on Gonzalo.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">O, but one word.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>They talk apart</p>
               <p>Re-enter ARIEL, invisible</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">My master through his art foresees the danger</div>
                     <div class="line">That you, his friend, are in; and sends me forth--</div>
                     <div class="line">For else his project dies--to keep them living.</div>
                     <p>Sings in GONZALO's ear</p>
                     <div class="line">While you here do snoring lie,</div>
                     <div class="line">Open-eyed conspiracy</div>
                     <div class="line">His time doth take.</div>
                     <div class="line">If of life you keep a care,</div>
                     <div class="line">Shake off slumber, and beware:</div>
                     <div class="line">Awake, awake!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Then let us both be sudden.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, good angels</div>
                     <div class="line">Preserve the king.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>They wake</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, how now? ho, awake! Why are you drawn?</div>
                     <div class="line">Wherefore this ghastly looking?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">What's the matter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Whiles we stood here securing your repose,</div>
                     <div class="line">Even now, we heard a hollow burst of bellowing</div>
                     <div class="line">Like bulls, or rather lions: did't not wake you?</div>
                     <div class="line">It struck mine ear most terribly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">I heard nothing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, 'twas a din to fright a monster's ear,</div>
                     <div class="line">To make an earthquake! sure, it was the roar</div>
                     <div class="line">Of a whole herd of lions.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Heard you this, Gonzalo?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon mine honour, sir, I heard a humming,</div>
                     <div class="line">And that a strange one too, which did awake me:</div>
                     <div class="line">I shaked you, sir, and cried: as mine eyes open'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">I saw their weapons drawn: there was a noise,</div>
                     <div class="line">That's verily. 'Tis best we stand upon our guard,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or that we quit this place; let's draw our weapons.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Lead off this ground; and let's make further search</div>
                     <div class="line">For my poor son.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Heavens keep him from these beasts!</div>
                     <div class="line">For he is, sure, i' the island.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Lead away.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">Prospero my lord shall know what I have done:</div>
                     <div class="line">So, king, go safely on to seek thy son.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  Another part of the island.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter CALIBAN with a burden of wood. A noise of
thunder heard</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">All the infections that the sun sucks up</div>
                     <div class="line">From bogs, fens, flats, on Prosper fall and make him</div>
                     <div class="line">By inch-meal a disease! His spirits hear me</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet I needs must curse. But they'll nor pinch,</div>
                     <div class="line">Fright me with urchin--shows, pitch me i' the mire,</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor lead me, like a firebrand, in the dark</div>
                     <div class="line">Out of my way, unless he bid 'em; but</div>
                     <div class="line">For every trifle are they set upon me;</div>
                     <div class="line">Sometime like apes that mow and chatter at me</div>
                     <div class="line">And after bite me, then like hedgehogs which</div>
                     <div class="line">Lie tumbling in my barefoot way and mount</div>
                     <div class="line">Their pricks at my footfall; sometime am I</div>
                     <div class="line">All wound with adders who with cloven tongues</div>
                     <div class="line">Do hiss me into madness.</div>
                     <p>Enter TRINCULO</p>
                     <div class="line">Lo, now, lo!</div>
                     <div class="line">Here comes a spirit of his, and to torment me</div>
                     <div class="line">For bringing wood in slowly. I'll fall flat;</div>
                     <div class="line">Perchance he will not mind me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Here's neither bush nor shrub, to bear off</div>
                     <div class="line">any weather at all, and another storm brewing;</div>
                     <div class="line">I hear it sing i' the wind: yond same black</div>
                     <div class="line">cloud, yond huge one, looks like a foul</div>
                     <div class="line">bombard that would shed his liquor. If it</div>
                     <div class="line">should thunder as it did before, I know not</div>
                     <div class="line">where to hide my head: yond same cloud cannot</div>
                     <div class="line">choose but fall by pailfuls. What have we</div>
                     <div class="line">here? a man or a fish? dead or alive? A fish:</div>
                     <div class="line">he smells like a fish; a very ancient and fish-</div>
                     <div class="line">like smell; a kind of not of the newest Poor-</div>
                     <div class="line">John. A strange fish! Were I in England now,</div>
                     <div class="line">as once I was, and had but this fish painted,</div>
                     <div class="line">not a holiday fool there but would give a piece</div>
                     <div class="line">of silver: there would this monster make a</div>
                     <div class="line">man; any strange beast there makes a man:</div>
                     <div class="line">when they will not give a doit to relieve a lame</div>
                     <div class="line">beggar, they will lazy out ten to see a dead</div>
                     <div class="line">Indian. Legged like a man and his fins like</div>
                     <div class="line">arms! Warm o' my troth! I do now let loose</div>
                     <div class="line">my opinion; hold it no longer: this is no fish,</div>
                     <div class="line">but an islander, that hath lately suffered by a</div>
                     <div class="line">thunderbolt.</div>
                     <p>Thunder</p>
                     <div class="line">Alas, the storm is come again! my best way is to</div>
                     <div class="line">creep under his gaberdine; there is no other</div>
                     <div class="line">shelter hereabouts: misery acquaints a man with</div>
                     <div class="line">strange bed-fellows. I will here shroud till the</div>
                     <div class="line">dregs of the storm be past.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter STEPHANO, singing: a bottle in his hand</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall no more to sea, to sea,</div>
                     <div class="line">Here shall I die ashore--</div>
                     <div class="line">This is a very scurvy tune to sing at a man's</div>
                     <div class="line">funeral: well, here's my comfort. <span>Drinks</span>
                     </div>
                     <p>Sings</p>
                     <div class="line">The master, the swabber, the boatswain and I,</div>
                     <div class="line">The gunner and his mate</div>
                     <div class="line">Loved Mall, Meg and Marian and Margery,</div>
                     <div class="line">But none of us cared for Kate;</div>
                     <div class="line">For she had a tongue with a tang,</div>
                     <div class="line">Would cry to a sailor, Go hang!</div>
                     <div class="line">She loved not the savour of tar nor of pitch,</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet a tailor might scratch her where'er she did itch:</div>
                     <div class="line">Then to sea, boys, and let her go hang!</div>
                     <div class="line">This is a scurvy tune too: but here's my comfort.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Drinks</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Do not torment me: Oh!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">What's the matter? Have we devils here? Do you put</div>
                     <div class="line">tricks upon's with savages and men of Ind, ha? I</div>
                     <div class="line">have not scaped drowning to be afeard now of your</div>
                     <div class="line">four legs; for it hath been said, As proper a man as</div>
                     <div class="line">ever went on four legs cannot make him give ground;</div>
                     <div class="line">and it shall be said so again while Stephano</div>
                     <div class="line">breathes at's nostrils.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">The spirit torments me; Oh!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">This is some monster of the isle with four legs, who</div>
                     <div class="line">hath got, as I take it, an ague. Where the devil</div>
                     <div class="line">should he learn our language? I will give him some</div>
                     <div class="line">relief, if it be but for that. if I can recover him</div>
                     <div class="line">and keep him tame and get to Naples with him, he's a</div>
                     <div class="line">present for any emperor that ever trod on neat's leather.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Do not torment me, prithee; I'll bring my wood home faster.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">He's in his fit now and does not talk after the</div>
                     <div class="line">wisest. He shall taste of my bottle: if he have</div>
                     <div class="line">never drunk wine afore will go near to remove his</div>
                     <div class="line">fit. If I can recover him and keep him tame, I will</div>
                     <div class="line">not take too much for him; he shall pay for him that</div>
                     <div class="line">hath him, and that soundly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou dost me yet but little hurt; thou wilt anon, I</div>
