                     <div class="line">know it by thy trembling: now Prosper works upon thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come on your ways; open your mouth; here is that</div>
                     <div class="line">which will give language to you, cat: open your</div>
                     <div class="line">mouth; this will shake your shaking, I can tell you,</div>
                     <div class="line">and that soundly: you cannot tell who's your friend:</div>
                     <div class="line">open your chaps again.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">I should know that voice: it should be--but he is</div>
                     <div class="line">drowned; and these are devils: O defend me!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Four legs and two voices: a most delicate monster!</div>
                     <div class="line">His forward voice now is to speak well of his</div>
                     <div class="line">friend; his backward voice is to utter foul speeches</div>
                     <div class="line">and to detract. If all the wine in my bottle will</div>
                     <div class="line">recover him, I will help his ague. Come. Amen! I</div>
                     <div class="line">will pour some in thy other mouth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Stephano!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Doth thy other mouth call me? Mercy, mercy! This is</div>
                     <div class="line">a devil, and no monster: I will leave him; I have no</div>
                     <div class="line">long spoon.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Stephano! If thou beest Stephano, touch me and</div>
                     <div class="line">speak to me: for I am Trinculo--be not afeard--thy</div>
                     <div class="line">good friend Trinculo.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">If thou beest Trinculo, come forth: I'll pull thee</div>
                     <div class="line">by the lesser legs: if any be Trinculo's legs,</div>
                     <div class="line">these are they. Thou art very Trinculo indeed! How</div>
                     <div class="line">camest thou to be the siege of this moon-calf? can</div>
                     <div class="line">he vent Trinculos?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">I took him to be killed with a thunder-stroke. But</div>
                     <div class="line">art thou not drowned, Stephano? I hope now thou art</div>
                     <div class="line">not drowned. Is the storm overblown? I hid me</div>
                     <div class="line">under the dead moon-calf's gaberdine for fear of</div>
                     <div class="line">the storm. And art thou living, Stephano? O</div>
                     <div class="line">Stephano, two Neapolitans 'scaped!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Prithee, do not turn me about; my stomach is not constant.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  These be fine things, an if they be</div>
                     <div class="line">not sprites.</div>
                     <div class="line">That's a brave god and bears celestial liquor.</div>
                     <div class="line">I will kneel to him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">How didst thou 'scape? How camest thou hither?</div>
                     <div class="line">swear by this bottle how thou camest hither. I</div>
                     <div class="line">escaped upon a butt of sack which the sailors</div>
                     <div class="line">heaved o'erboard, by this bottle; which I made of</div>
                     <div class="line">the bark of a tree with mine own hands since I was</div>
                     <div class="line">cast ashore.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll swear upon that bottle to be thy true subject;</div>
                     <div class="line">for the liquor is not earthly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Here; swear then how thou escapedst.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Swum ashore. man, like a duck: I can swim like a</div>
                     <div class="line">duck, I'll be sworn.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Here, kiss the book. Though thou canst swim like a</div>
                     <div class="line">duck, thou art made like a goose.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">O Stephano. hast any more of this?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">The whole butt, man: my cellar is in a rock by the</div>
                     <div class="line">sea-side where my wine is hid. How now, moon-calf!</div>
                     <div class="line">how does thine ague?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Hast thou not dropp'd from heaven?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Out o' the moon, I do assure thee: I was the man i'</div>
                     <div class="line">the moon when time was.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I have seen thee in her and I do adore thee:</div>
                     <div class="line">My mistress show'd me thee and thy dog and thy bush.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, swear to that; kiss the book: I will furnish</div>
                     <div class="line">it anon with new contents swear.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">By this good light, this is a very shallow monster!</div>
                     <div class="line">I afeard of him! A very weak monster! The man i'</div>
                     <div class="line">the moon! A most poor credulous monster! Well</div>
                     <div class="line">drawn, monster, in good sooth!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll show thee every fertile inch o' th' island;</div>
                     <div class="line">And I will kiss thy foot: I prithee, be my god.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">By this light, a most perfidious and drunken</div>
                     <div class="line">monster! when 's god's asleep, he'll rob his bottle.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll kiss thy foot; I'll swear myself thy subject.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come on then; down, and swear.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall laugh myself to death at this puppy-headed</div>
                     <div class="line">monster. A most scurvy monster! I could find in my</div>
                     <div class="line">heart to beat him,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, kiss.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">But that the poor monster's in drink: an abominable monster!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll show thee the best springs; I'll pluck thee berries;</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll fish for thee and get thee wood enough.</div>
                     <div class="line">A plague upon the tyrant that I serve!</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll bear him no more sticks, but follow thee,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou wondrous man.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">A most ridiculous monster, to make a wonder of a</div>
                     <div class="line">Poor drunkard!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I prithee, let me bring thee where crabs grow;</div>
                     <div class="line">And I with my long nails will dig thee pignuts;</div>
                     <div class="line">Show thee a jay's nest and instruct thee how</div>
                     <div class="line">To snare the nimble marmoset; I'll bring thee</div>
                     <div class="line">To clustering filberts and sometimes I'll get thee</div>
                     <div class="line">Young scamels from the rock. Wilt thou go with me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">I prithee now, lead the way without any more</div>
                     <div class="line">talking. Trinculo, the king and all our company</div>
                     <div class="line">else being drowned, we will inherit here: here;</div>
                     <div class="line">bear my bottle: fellow Trinculo, we'll fill him by</div>
                     <div class="line">and by again.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Sings drunkenly</span>
                     </div>
                     <div class="line">Farewell master; farewell, farewell!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">A howling monster: a drunken monster!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">No more dams I'll make for fish</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor fetch in firing</div>
                     <div class="line">At requiring;</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor scrape trencher, nor wash dish</div>
                     <div class="line">'Ban, 'Ban, Cacaliban</div>
                     <div class="line">Has a new master: get a new man.</div>
                     <div class="line">Freedom, hey-day! hey-day, freedom! freedom,</div>
                     <div class="line">hey-day, freedom!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">O brave monster! Lead the way.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S Cell.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  Another part of the island.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  Another part of the island.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S Cell.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter FERDINAND, bearing a log</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">There be some sports are painful, and their labour</div>
                     <div class="line">Delight in them sets off: some kinds of baseness</div>
                     <div class="line">Are nobly undergone and most poor matters</div>
                     <div class="line">Point to rich ends. This my mean task</div>
                     <div class="line">Would be as heavy to me as odious, but</div>
                     <div class="line">The mistress which I serve quickens what's dead</div>
                     <div class="line">And makes my labours pleasures: O, she is</div>
                     <div class="line">Ten times more gentle than her father's crabbed,</div>
                     <div class="line">And he's composed of harshness. I must remove</div>
                     <div class="line">Some thousands of these logs and pile them up,</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon a sore injunction: my sweet mistress</div>
                     <div class="line">Weeps when she sees me work, and says, such baseness</div>
                     <div class="line">Had never like executor. I forget:</div>
                     <div class="line">But these sweet thoughts do even refresh my labours,</div>
                     <div class="line">Most busy lest, when I do it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter MIRANDA; and PROSPERO at a distance, unseen</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, now, pray you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Work not so hard: I would the lightning had</div>
                     <div class="line">Burnt up those logs that you are enjoin'd to pile!</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray, set it down and rest you: when this burns,</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twill weep for having wearied you. My father</div>
                     <div class="line">Is hard at study; pray now, rest yourself;</div>
                     <div class="line">He's safe for these three hours.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">O most dear mistress,</div>
                     <div class="line">The sun will set before I shall discharge</div>
                     <div class="line">What I must strive to do.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">If you'll sit down,</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll bear your logs the while: pray, give me that;</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll carry it to the pile.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">No, precious creature;</div>
                     <div class="line">I had rather crack my sinews, break my back,</div>
                     <div class="line">Than you should such dishonour undergo,</div>
                     <div class="line">While I sit lazy by.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">It would become me</div>
                     <div class="line">As well as it does you: and I should do it</div>
                     <div class="line">With much more ease; for my good will is to it,</div>
                     <div class="line">And yours it is against.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Poor worm, thou art infected!</div>
                     <div class="line">This visitation shows it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">You look wearily.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">No, noble mistress;'tis fresh morning with me</div>
                     <div class="line">When you are by at night. I do beseech you--</div>
                     <div class="line">Chiefly that I might set it in my prayers--</div>
                     <div class="line">What is your name?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Miranda.--O my father,</div>
                     <div class="line">I have broke your hest to say so!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Admired Miranda!</div>
                     <div class="line">Indeed the top of admiration! worth</div>
                     <div class="line">What's dearest to the world! Full many a lady</div>
                     <div class="line">I have eyed with best regard and many a time</div>
                     <div class="line">The harmony of their tongues hath into bondage</div>
                     <div class="line">Brought my too diligent ear: for several virtues</div>
                     <div class="line">Have I liked several women; never any</div>
                     <div class="line">With so fun soul, but some defect in her</div>
                     <div class="line">Did quarrel with the noblest grace she owed</div>
                     <div class="line">And put it to the foil: but you, O you,</div>
                     <div class="line">So perfect and so peerless, are created</div>
                     <div class="line">Of every creature's best!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">I do not know</div>
                     <div class="line">One of my sex; no woman's face remember,</div>
                     <div class="line">Save, from my glass, mine own; nor have I seen</div>
                     <div class="line">More that I may call men than you, good friend,</div>
                     <div class="line">And my dear father: how features are abroad,</div>
                     <div class="line">I am skilless of; but, by my modesty,</div>
                     <div class="line">The jewel in my dower, I would not wish</div>
                     <div class="line">Any companion in the world but you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor can imagination form a shape,</div>
                     <div class="line">Besides yourself, to like of. But I prattle</div>
                     <div class="line">Something too wildly and my father's precepts</div>
                     <div class="line">I therein do forget.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">I am in my condition</div>
                     <div class="line">A prince, Miranda; I do think, a king;</div>
                     <div class="line">I would, not so!--and would no more endure</div>
                     <div class="line">This wooden slavery than to suffer</div>
                     <div class="line">The flesh-fly blow my mouth. Hear my soul speak:</div>
                     <div class="line">The very instant that I saw you, did</div>
                     <div class="line">My heart fly to your service; there resides,</div>
                     <div class="line">To make me slave to it; and for your sake</div>
                     <div class="line">Am I this patient log--man.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you love me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">O heaven, O earth, bear witness to this sound</div>
                     <div class="line">And crown what I profess with kind event</div>
                     <div class="line">If I speak true! if hollowly, invert</div>
                     <div class="line">What best is boded me to mischief! I</div>
                     <div class="line">Beyond all limit of what else i' the world</div>
                     <div class="line">Do love, prize, honour you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">I am a fool</div>
                     <div class="line">To weep at what I am glad of.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Fair encounter</div>
                     <div class="line">Of two most rare affections! Heavens rain grace</div>
                     <div class="line">On that which breeds between 'em!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Wherefore weep you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">At mine unworthiness that dare not offer</div>
                     <div class="line">What I desire to give, and much less take</div>
                     <div class="line">What I shall die to want. But this is trifling;</div>
                     <div class="line">And all the more it seeks to hide itself,</div>
                     <div class="line">The bigger bulk it shows. Hence, bashful cunning!</div>
                     <div class="line">And prompt me, plain and holy innocence!</div>
                     <div class="line">I am your wife, it you will marry me;</div>
                     <div class="line">If not, I'll die your maid: to be your fellow</div>
                     <div class="line">You may deny me; but I'll be your servant,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whether you will or no.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">My mistress, dearest;</div>
                     <div class="line">And I thus humble ever.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">My husband, then?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, with a heart as willing</div>
                     <div class="line">As bondage e'er of freedom: here's my hand.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">And mine, with my heart in't; and now farewell</div>
                     <div class="line">Till half an hour hence.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">A thousand thousand!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt FERDINAND and MIRANDA severally</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">So glad of this as they I cannot be,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who are surprised withal; but my rejoicing</div>
                     <div class="line">At nothing can be more. I'll to my book,</div>
                     <div class="line">For yet ere supper-time must I perform</div>
                     <div class="line">Much business appertaining.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  Another part of the island.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter CALIBAN, STEPHANO, and TRINCULO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Tell not me; when the butt is out, we will drink</div>
                     <div class="line">water; not a drop before: therefore bear up, and</div>
                     <div class="line">board 'em. Servant-monster, drink to me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Servant-monster! the folly of this island! They</div>
                     <div class="line">say there's but five upon this isle: we are three</div>
                     <div class="line">of them; if th' other two be brained like us, the</div>
                     <div class="line">state totters.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Drink, servant-monster, when I bid thee: thy eyes</div>
                     <div class="line">are almost set in thy head.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Where should they be set else? he were a brave</div>
                     <div class="line">monster indeed, if they were set in his tail.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">My man-monster hath drown'd his tongue in sack:</div>
                     <div class="line">for my part, the sea cannot drown me; I swam, ere I</div>
                     <div class="line">could recover the shore, five and thirty leagues off</div>
                     <div class="line">and on. By this light, thou shalt be my lieutenant,</div>
                     <div class="line">monster, or my standard.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Your lieutenant, if you list; he's no standard.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">We'll not run, Monsieur Monster.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor go neither; but you'll lie like dogs and yet say</div>
                     <div class="line">nothing neither.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Moon-calf, speak once in thy life, if thou beest a</div>
                     <div class="line">good moon-calf.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">How does thy honour? Let me lick thy shoe.</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll not serve him; he's not valiant.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou liest, most ignorant monster: I am in case to</div>
                     <div class="line">justle a constable. Why, thou deboshed fish thou,</div>
                     <div class="line">was there ever man a coward that hath drunk so much</div>
                     <div class="line">sack as I to-day? Wilt thou tell a monstrous lie,</div>
                     <div class="line">being but half a fish and half a monster?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Lo, how he mocks me! wilt thou let him, my lord?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Lord' quoth he! That a monster should be such a natural!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Lo, lo, again! bite him to death, I prithee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Trinculo, keep a good tongue in your head: if you</div>
                     <div class="line">prove a mutineer,--the next tree! The poor monster's</div>
                     <div class="line">my subject and he shall not suffer indignity.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I thank my noble lord. Wilt thou be pleased to</div>
                     <div class="line">hearken once again to the suit I made to thee?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, will I kneel and repeat it; I will stand,</div>
                     <div class="line">and so shall Trinculo.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ARIEL, invisible</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">As I told thee before, I am subject to a tyrant, a</div>
                     <div class="line">sorcerer, that by his cunning hath cheated me of the island.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou liest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou liest, thou jesting monkey, thou: I would my</div>
                     <div class="line">valiant master would destroy thee! I do not lie.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Trinculo, if you trouble him any more in's tale, by</div>
                     <div class="line">this hand, I will supplant some of your teeth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, I said nothing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Mum, then, and no more. Proceed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I say, by sorcery he got this isle;</div>
                     <div class="line">From me he got it. if thy greatness will</div>
                     <div class="line">Revenge it on him,--for I know thou darest,</div>
                     <div class="line">But this thing dare not,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">That's most certain.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou shalt be lord of it and I'll serve thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">How now shall this be compassed?</div>
                     <div class="line">Canst thou bring me to the party?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Yea, yea, my lord: I'll yield him thee asleep,</div>
                     <div class="line">Where thou mayst knock a nail into his bead.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou liest; thou canst not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">What a pied ninny's this! Thou scurvy patch!</div>
                     <div class="line">I do beseech thy greatness, give him blows</div>
                     <div class="line">And take his bottle from him: when that's gone</div>
                     <div class="line">He shall drink nought but brine; for I'll not show him</div>
                     <div class="line">Where the quick freshes are.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Trinculo, run into no further danger:</div>
                     <div class="line">interrupt the monster one word further, and,</div>
                     <div class="line">by this hand, I'll turn my mercy out o' doors</div>
                     <div class="line">and make a stock-fish of thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, what did I? I did nothing. I'll go farther</div>
                     <div class="line">off.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Didst thou not say he lied?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou liest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Do I so? take thou that.</div>
                     <p>Beats TRINCULO</p>
                     <div class="line">As you like this, give me the lie another time.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">I did not give the lie. Out o' your</div>
                     <div class="line">wits and bearing too? A pox o' your bottle!</div>
                     <div class="line">this can sack and drinking do. A murrain on</div>
                     <div class="line">your monster, and the devil take your fingers!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Ha, ha, ha!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, forward with your tale. Prithee, stand farther</div>
                     <div class="line">off.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Beat him enough: after a little time</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll beat him too.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Stand farther. Come, proceed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, as I told thee, 'tis a custom with him,</div>
                     <div class="line">I' th' afternoon to sleep: there thou mayst brain him,</div>
                     <div class="line">Having first seized his books, or with a log</div>
                     <div class="line">Batter his skull, or paunch him with a stake,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or cut his wezand with thy knife. Remember</div>
                     <div class="line">First to possess his books; for without them</div>
                     <div class="line">He's but a sot, as I am, nor hath not</div>
                     <div class="line">One spirit to command: they all do hate him</div>
                     <div class="line">As rootedly as I. Burn but his books.</div>
                     <div class="line">He has brave utensils,--for so he calls them--</div>
                     <div class="line">Which when he has a house, he'll deck withal</div>
                     <div class="line">And that most deeply to consider is</div>
                     <div class="line">The beauty of his daughter; he himself</div>
                     <div class="line">Calls her a nonpareil: I never saw a woman,</div>
                     <div class="line">But only Sycorax my dam and she;</div>
                     <div class="line">But she as far surpasseth Sycorax</div>
                     <div class="line">As great'st does least.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Is it so brave a lass?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, lord; she will become thy bed, I warrant.</div>
                     <div class="line">And bring thee forth brave brood.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Monster, I will kill this man: his daughter and I</div>
                     <div class="line">will be king and queen--save our graces!--and</div>
                     <div class="line">Trinculo and thyself shall be viceroys. Dost thou</div>
                     <div class="line">like the plot, Trinculo?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Excellent.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Give me thy hand: I am sorry I beat thee; but,</div>
                     <div class="line">while thou livest, keep a good tongue in thy head.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Within this half hour will he be asleep:</div>
                     <div class="line">Wilt thou destroy him then?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, on mine honour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">This will I tell my master.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou makest me merry; I am full of pleasure:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let us be jocund: will you troll the catch</div>
                     <div class="line">You taught me but while-ere?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">At thy request, monster, I will do reason, any</div>
                     <div class="line">reason. Come on, Trinculo, let us sing.</div>
                     <p>Sings</p>
                     <div class="line">Flout 'em and scout 'em</div>
                     <div class="line">And scout 'em and flout 'em</div>
                     <div class="line">Thought is free.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">That's not the tune.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Ariel plays the tune on a tabour and pipe</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">What is this same?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">This is the tune of our catch, played by the picture</div>
                     <div class="line">of Nobody.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">If thou beest a man, show thyself in thy likeness:</div>
                     <div class="line">if thou beest a devil, take't as thou list.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, forgive me my sins!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">He that dies pays all debts: I defy thee. Mercy upon us!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Art thou afeard?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">No, monster, not I.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Be not afeard; the isle is full of noises,</div>
                     <div class="line">Sounds and sweet airs, that give delight and hurt not.</div>
                     <div class="line">Sometimes a thousand twangling instruments</div>
                     <div class="line">Will hum about mine ears, and sometime voices</div>
                     <div class="line">That, if I then had waked after long sleep,</div>
                     <div class="line">Will make me sleep again: and then, in dreaming,</div>
                     <div class="line">The clouds methought would open and show riches</div>
                     <div class="line">Ready to drop upon me that, when I waked,</div>
                     <div class="line">I cried to dream again.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">This will prove a brave kingdom to me, where I shall</div>
                     <div class="line">have my music for nothing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">When Prospero is destroyed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">That shall be by and by: I remember the story.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">The sound is going away; let's follow it, and</div>
                     <div class="line">after do our work.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Lead, monster; we'll follow. I would I could see</div>
                     <div class="line">this tabourer; he lays it on.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Wilt come? I'll follow, Stephano.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.5.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III.  Another part of the island.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, GONZALO,
ADRIAN, FRANCISCO, and others</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">By'r lakin, I can go no further, sir;</div>
                     <div class="line">My old bones ache: here's a maze trod indeed</div>
                     <div class="line">Through forth-rights and meanders! By your patience,</div>
                     <div class="line">I needs must rest me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Old lord, I cannot blame thee,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who am myself attach'd with weariness,</div>
                     <div class="line">To the dulling of my spirits: sit down, and rest.</div>
                     <div class="line">Even here I will put off my hope and keep it</div>
                     <div class="line">No longer for my flatterer: he is drown'd</div>
                     <div class="line">Whom thus we stray to find, and the sea mocks</div>
                     <div class="line">Our frustrate search on land. Well, let him go.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to SEBASTIAN</span>  I am right glad that he's so</div>
                     <div class="line">out of hope.</div>
                     <div class="line">Do not, for one repulse, forego the purpose</div>
                     <div class="line">That you resolved to effect.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to ANTONIO</span>  The next advantage</div>
                     <div class="line">Will we take throughly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to SEBASTIAN</span>  Let it be to-night;</div>
                     <div class="line">For, now they are oppress'd with travel, they</div>
                     <div class="line">Will not, nor cannot, use such vigilance</div>
                     <div class="line">As when they are fresh.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to ANTONIO</span>  I say, to-night: no more.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Solemn and strange music</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">What harmony is this? My good friends, hark!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Marvellous sweet music!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter PROSPERO above, invisible. Enter several
strange Shapes, bringing in a banquet;
they dance about it with gentle actions of
salutation; and, inviting the King, &c. to
eat, they depart</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Give us kind keepers, heavens! What were these?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">A living drollery. Now I will believe</div>
                     <div class="line">That there are unicorns, that in Arabia</div>
                     <div class="line">There is one tree, the phoenix' throne, one phoenix</div>
                     <div class="line">At this hour reigning there.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll believe both;</div>
                     <div class="line">And what does else want credit, come to me,</div>
                     <div class="line">And I'll be sworn 'tis true: travellers ne'er did</div>
                     <div class="line">lie,</div>
                     <div class="line">Though fools at home condemn 'em.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">If in Naples</div>
                     <div class="line">I should report this now, would they believe me?</div>
                     <div class="line">If I should say, I saw such islanders--</div>
                     <div class="line">For, certes, these are people of the island--</div>
                     <div class="line">Who, though they are of monstrous shape, yet, note,</div>
                     <div class="line">Their manners are more gentle-kind than of</div>
                     <div class="line">Our human generation you shall find</div>
                     <div class="line">Many, nay, almost any.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>              Honest lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou hast said well; for some of you there present</div>
                     <div class="line">Are worse than devils.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">I cannot too much muse</div>
                     <div class="line">Such shapes, such gesture and such sound, expressing,</div>
                     <div class="line">Although they want the use of tongue, a kind</div>
                     <div class="line">Of excellent dumb discourse.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span> Praise in departing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FRANCISCO</div>
                     <div class="line">They vanish'd strangely.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">No matter, since</div>
                     <div class="line">They have left their viands behind; for we have stomachs.</div>
                     <div class="line">Will't please you taste of what is here?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Not I.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Faith, sir, you need not fear. When we were boys,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who would believe that there were mountaineers</div>
                     <div class="line">Dew-lapp'd like bulls, whose throats had hanging at 'em</div>
                     <div class="line">Wallets of flesh? or that there were such men</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose heads stood in their breasts? which now we find</div>
                     <div class="line">Each putter-out of five for one will bring us</div>
                     <div class="line">Good warrant of.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">I will stand to and feed,</div>
                     <div class="line">Although my last: no matter, since I feel</div>
                     <div class="line">The best is past. Brother, my lord the duke,</div>
                     <div class="line">Stand to and do as we.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Thunder and lightning. Enter ARIEL, like a
harpy; claps his wings upon the table; and,
with a quaint device, the banquet vanishes</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">You are three men of sin, whom Destiny,</div>
                     <div class="line">That hath to instrument this lower world</div>
                     <div class="line">And what is in't, the never-surfeited sea</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath caused to belch up you; and on this island</div>
                     <div class="line">Where man doth not inhabit; you 'mongst men</div>
                     <div class="line">Being most unfit to live. I have made you mad;</div>
                     <div class="line">And even with such-like valour men hang and drown</div>
                     <div class="line">Their proper selves.</div>
                     <p>ALONSO, SEBASTIAN &c. draw their swords</p>
                     <div class="line">You fools! I and my fellows</div>
                     <div class="line">Are ministers of Fate: the elements,</div>
                     <div class="line">Of whom your swords are temper'd, may as well</div>
                     <div class="line">Wound the loud winds, or with bemock'd-at stabs</div>
                     <div class="line">Kill the still-closing waters, as diminish</div>
                     <div class="line">One dowle that's in my plume: my fellow-ministers</div>
                     <div class="line">Are like invulnerable. If you could hurt,</div>
                     <div class="line">Your swords are now too massy for your strengths</div>
                     <div class="line">And will not be uplifted. But remember--</div>
                     <div class="line">For that's my business to you--that you three</div>
                     <div class="line">From Milan did supplant good Prospero;</div>
                     <div class="line">Exposed unto the sea, which hath requit it,</div>
                     <div class="line">Him and his innocent child: for which foul deed</div>
                     <div class="line">The powers, delaying, not forgetting, have</div>
                     <div class="line">Incensed the seas and shores, yea, all the creatures,</div>
                     <div class="line">Against your peace. Thee of thy son, Alonso,</div>
                     <div class="line">They have bereft; and do pronounce by me:</div>
                     <div class="line">Lingering perdition, worse than any death</div>
                     <div class="line">Can be at once, shall step by step attend</div>
                     <div class="line">You and your ways; whose wraths to guard you from--</div>
                     <div class="line">Which here, in this most desolate isle, else falls</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon your heads--is nothing but heart-sorrow</div>
                     <div class="line">And a clear life ensuing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>He vanishes in thunder; then, to soft music
enter the Shapes again, and dance, with
mocks and mows, and carrying out the table</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Bravely the figure of this harpy hast thou</div>
                     <div class="line">Perform'd, my Ariel; a grace it had, devouring:</div>
                     <div class="line">Of my instruction hast thou nothing bated</div>
                     <div class="line">In what thou hadst to say: so, with good life</div>
                     <div class="line">And observation strange, my meaner ministers</div>
                     <div class="line">Their several kinds have done. My high charms work</div>
                     <div class="line">And these mine enemies are all knit up</div>
                     <div class="line">In their distractions; they now are in my power;</div>
                     <div class="line">And in these fits I leave them, while I visit</div>
                     <div class="line">Young Ferdinand, whom they suppose is drown'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">And his and mine loved darling.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit above</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">I' the name of something holy, sir, why stand you</div>
                     <div class="line">In this strange stare?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, it is monstrous, monstrous:</div>
                     <div class="line">Methought the billows spoke and told me of it;</div>
                     <div class="line">The winds did sing it to me, and the thunder,</div>
                     <div class="line">That deep and dreadful organ-pipe, pronounced</div>
                     <div class="line">The name of Prosper: it did bass my trespass.</div>
                     <div class="line">Therefore my son i' the ooze is bedded, and</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll seek him deeper than e'er plummet sounded</div>
                     <div class="line">And with him there lie mudded.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">But one fiend at a time,</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll fight their legions o'er.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll be thy second.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt SEBASTIAN, and ANTONIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">All three of them are desperate: their great guilt,</div>
                     <div class="line">Like poison given to work a great time after,</div>
                     <div class="line">Now 'gins to bite the spirits. I do beseech you</div>
                     <div class="line">That are of suppler joints, follow them swiftly</div>
                     <div class="line">And hinder them from what this ecstasy</div>
                     <div class="line">May now provoke them to.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Follow, I pray you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 4. ACT IV</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter PROSPERO, FERDINAND, and MIRANDA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">If I have too austerely punish'd you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Your compensation makes amends, for I</div>
                     <div class="line">Have given you here a third of mine own life,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or that for which I live; who once again</div>
                     <div class="line">I tender to thy hand: all thy vexations</div>
                     <div class="line">Were but my trials of thy love and thou</div>
                     <div class="line">Hast strangely stood the test here, afore Heaven,</div>
                     <div class="line">I ratify this my rich gift. O Ferdinand,</div>
                     <div class="line">Do not smile at me that I boast her off,</div>
                     <div class="line">For thou shalt find she will outstrip all praise</div>
                     <div class="line">And make it halt behind her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">I do believe it</div>
                     <div class="line">Against an oracle.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Then, as my gift and thine own acquisition</div>
                     <div class="line">Worthily purchased take my daughter: but</div>
                     <div class="line">If thou dost break her virgin-knot before</div>
                     <div class="line">All sanctimonious ceremonies may</div>
                     <div class="line">With full and holy rite be minister'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">No sweet aspersion shall the heavens let fall</div>
                     <div class="line">To make this contract grow: but barren hate,</div>
                     <div class="line">Sour-eyed disdain and discord shall bestrew</div>
                     <div class="line">The union of your bed with weeds so loathly</div>
                     <div class="line">That you shall hate it both: therefore take heed,</div>
                     <div class="line">As Hymen's lamps shall light you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">As I hope</div>
                     <div class="line">For quiet days, fair issue and long life,</div>
                     <div class="line">With such love as 'tis now, the murkiest den,</div>
                     <div class="line">The most opportune place, the strong'st suggestion.</div>
                     <div class="line">Our worser genius can, shall never melt</div>
                     <div class="line">Mine honour into lust, to take away</div>
                     <div class="line">The edge of that day's celebration</div>
                     <div class="line">When I shall think: or Phoebus' steeds are founder'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or Night kept chain'd below.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Fairly spoke.</div>
                     <div class="line">Sit then and talk with her; she is thine own.</div>
                     <div class="line">What, Ariel! my industrious servant, Ariel!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ARIEL</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">What would my potent master? here I am.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou and thy meaner fellows your last service</div>
                     <div class="line">Did worthily perform; and I must use you</div>
                     <div class="line">In such another trick. Go bring the rabble,</div>
                     <div class="line">O'er whom I give thee power, here to this place:</div>
                     <div class="line">Incite them to quick motion; for I must</div>
                     <div class="line">Bestow upon the eyes of this young couple</div>
                     <div class="line">Some vanity of mine art: it is my promise,</div>
                     <div class="line">And they expect it from me.</div>
                  </div>
