               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">Presently?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, with a twink.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">Before you can say 'come' and 'go,'</div>
                     <div class="line">And breathe twice and cry 'so, so,'</div>
                     <div class="line">Each one, tripping on his toe,</div>
                     <div class="line">Will be here with mop and mow.</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you love me, master? no?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Dearly my delicate Ariel. Do not approach</div>
                     <div class="line">Till thou dost hear me call.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, I conceive.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Look thou be true; do not give dalliance</div>
                     <div class="line">Too much the rein: the strongest oaths are straw</div>
                     <div class="line">To the fire i' the blood: be more abstemious,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or else, good night your vow!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">I warrant you sir;</div>
                     <div class="line">The white cold virgin snow upon my heart</div>
                     <div class="line">Abates the ardour of my liver.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well.</div>
                     <div class="line">Now come, my Ariel! bring a corollary,</div>
                     <div class="line">Rather than want a spirit: appear and pertly!</div>
                     <div class="line">No tongue! all eyes! be silent.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Soft music</p>
               <p>Enter IRIS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IRIS</div>
                     <div class="line">Ceres, most bounteous lady, thy rich leas</div>
                     <div class="line">Of wheat, rye, barley, vetches, oats and pease;</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy turfy mountains, where live nibbling sheep,</div>
                     <div class="line">And flat meads thatch'd with stover, them to keep;</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy banks with pioned and twilled brims,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which spongy April at thy hest betrims,</div>
                     <div class="line">To make cold nymphs chaste crowns; and thy broom -groves,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose shadow the dismissed bachelor loves,</div>
                     <div class="line">Being lass-lorn: thy pole-clipt vineyard;</div>
                     <div class="line">And thy sea-marge, sterile and rocky-hard,</div>
                     <div class="line">Where thou thyself dost air;--the queen o' the sky,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose watery arch and messenger am I,</div>
                     <div class="line">Bids thee leave these, and with her sovereign grace,</div>
                     <div class="line">Here on this grass-plot, in this very place,</div>
                     <div class="line">To come and sport: her peacocks fly amain:</div>
                     <div class="line">Approach, rich Ceres, her to entertain.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter CERES</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CERES</div>
                     <div class="line">Hail, many-colour'd messenger, that ne'er</div>
                     <div class="line">Dost disobey the wife of Jupiter;</div>
                     <div class="line">Who with thy saffron wings upon my flowers</div>
                     <div class="line">Diffusest honey-drops, refreshing showers,</div>
                     <div class="line">And with each end of thy blue bow dost crown</div>
                     <div class="line">My bosky acres and my unshrubb'd down,</div>
                     <div class="line">Rich scarf to my proud earth; why hath thy queen</div>
                     <div class="line">Summon'd me hither, to this short-grass'd green?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IRIS</div>
                     <div class="line">A contract of true love to celebrate;</div>
                     <div class="line">And some donation freely to estate</div>
                     <div class="line">On the blest lovers.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CERES</div>
                     <div class="line">Tell me, heavenly bow,</div>
                     <div class="line">If Venus or her son, as thou dost know,</div>
                     <div class="line">Do now attend the queen? Since they did plot</div>
                     <div class="line">The means that dusky Dis my daughter got,</div>
                     <div class="line">Her and her blind boy's scandal'd company</div>
                     <div class="line">I have forsworn.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IRIS</div>
                     <div class="line">Of her society</div>
                     <div class="line">Be not afraid: I met her deity</div>
                     <div class="line">Cutting the clouds towards Paphos and her son</div>
                     <div class="line">Dove-drawn with her. Here thought they to have done</div>
                     <div class="line">Some wanton charm upon this man and maid,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose vows are, that no bed-right shall be paid</div>
                     <div class="line">Till Hymen's torch be lighted: but vain;</div>
                     <div class="line">Mars's hot minion is returned again;</div>
                     <div class="line">Her waspish-headed son has broke his arrows,</div>
                     <div class="line">Swears he will shoot no more but play with sparrows</div>
                     <div class="line">And be a boy right out.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CERES</div>
                     <div class="line">High'st queen of state,</div>
                     <div class="line">Great Juno, comes; I know her by her gait.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter JUNO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JUNO</div>
                     <div class="line">How does my bounteous sister? Go with me</div>
                     <div class="line">To bless this twain, that they may prosperous be</div>
                     <div class="line">And honour'd in their issue.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>They sing:</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JUNO</div>
                     <div class="line">Honour, riches, marriage-blessing,</div>
                     <div class="line">Long continuance, and increasing,</div>
                     <div class="line">Hourly joys be still upon you!</div>
                     <div class="line">Juno sings her blessings upon you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CERES</div>
                     <div class="line">Earth's increase, foison plenty,</div>
                     <div class="line">Barns and garners never empty,</div>
                     <div class="line">Vines and clustering bunches growing,</div>
                     <div class="line">Plants with goodly burthen bowing;</div>
                     <div class="line">Spring come to you at the farthest</div>
                     <div class="line">In the very end of harvest!</div>
                     <div class="line">Scarcity and want shall shun you;</div>
                     <div class="line">Ceres' blessing so is on you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">This is a most majestic vision, and</div>
                     <div class="line">Harmoniously charmingly. May I be bold</div>
                     <div class="line">To think these spirits?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Spirits, which by mine art</div>
                     <div class="line">I have from their confines call'd to enact</div>
                     <div class="line">My present fancies.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Let me live here ever;</div>
                     <div class="line">So rare a wonder'd father and a wife</div>
                     <div class="line">Makes this place Paradise.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Juno and Ceres whisper, and send Iris on
employment</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet, now, silence!</div>
                     <div class="line">Juno and Ceres whisper seriously;</div>
                     <div class="line">There's something else to do: hush, and be mute,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or else our spell is marr'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IRIS</div>
                     <div class="line">You nymphs, call'd Naiads, of the windring brooks,</div>
                     <div class="line">With your sedged crowns and ever-harmless looks,</div>
                     <div class="line">Leave your crisp channels and on this green land</div>
                     <div class="line">Answer your summons; Juno does command:</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, temperate nymphs, and help to celebrate</div>
                     <div class="line">A contract of true love; be not too late.</div>
                     <p>Enter certain Nymphs</p>
                     <div class="line">You sunburnt sicklemen, of August weary,</div>
                     <div class="line">Come hither from the furrow and be merry:</div>
                     <div class="line">Make holiday; your rye-straw hats put on</div>
                     <div class="line">And these fresh nymphs encounter every one</div>
                     <div class="line">In country footing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter certain Reapers, properly habited: they
join with the Nymphs in a graceful dance;
towards the end whereof PROSPERO starts
suddenly, and speaks; after which, to a
strange, hollow, and confused noise, they
heavily vanish</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  I had forgot that foul conspiracy</div>
                     <div class="line">Of the beast Caliban and his confederates</div>
                     <div class="line">Against my life: the minute of their plot</div>
                     <div class="line">Is almost come.</div>
                     <p>To the Spirits</p>
                     <div class="line">Well done! avoid; no more!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">This is strange: your father's in some passion</div>
                     <div class="line">That works him strongly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Never till this day</div>
                     <div class="line">Saw I him touch'd with anger so distemper'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">You do look, my son, in a moved sort,</div>
                     <div class="line">As if you were dismay'd: be cheerful, sir.</div>
                     <div class="line">Our revels now are ended. These our actors,</div>
                     <div class="line">As I foretold you, were all spirits and</div>
                     <div class="line">Are melted into air, into thin air:</div>
                     <div class="line">And, like the baseless fabric of this vision,</div>
                     <div class="line">The cloud-capp'd towers, the gorgeous palaces,</div>
                     <div class="line">The solemn temples, the great globe itself,</div>
                     <div class="line">Ye all which it inherit, shall dissolve</div>
                     <div class="line">And, like this insubstantial pageant faded,</div>
                     <div class="line">Leave not a rack behind. We are such stuff</div>
                     <div class="line">As dreams are made on, and our little life</div>
                     <div class="line">Is rounded with a sleep. Sir, I am vex'd;</div>
                     <div class="line">Bear with my weakness; my, brain is troubled:</div>
                     <div class="line">Be not disturb'd with my infirmity:</div>
                     <div class="line">If you be pleased, retire into my cell</div>
                     <div class="line">And there repose: a turn or two I'll walk,</div>
                     <div class="line">To still my beating mind.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">We wish your peace.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come with a thought I thank thee, Ariel: come.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ARIEL</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy thoughts I cleave to. What's thy pleasure?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Spirit,</div>
                     <div class="line">We must prepare to meet with Caliban.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, my commander: when I presented Ceres,</div>
                     <div class="line">I thought to have told thee of it, but I fear'd</div>
                     <div class="line">Lest I might anger thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Say again, where didst thou leave these varlets?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">I told you, sir, they were red-hot with drinking;</div>
                     <div class="line">So fun of valour that they smote the air</div>
                     <div class="line">For breathing in their faces; beat the ground</div>
                     <div class="line">For kissing of their feet; yet always bending</div>
                     <div class="line">Towards their project. Then I beat my tabour;</div>
                     <div class="line">At which, like unback'd colts, they prick'd</div>
                     <div class="line">their ears,</div>
                     <div class="line">Advanced their eyelids, lifted up their noses</div>
                     <div class="line">As they smelt music: so I charm'd their ears</div>
                     <div class="line">That calf-like they my lowing follow'd through</div>
                     <div class="line">Tooth'd briers, sharp furzes, pricking goss and thorns,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which entered their frail shins: at last I left them</div>
                     <div class="line">I' the filthy-mantled pool beyond your cell,</div>
                     <div class="line">There dancing up to the chins, that the foul lake</div>
                     <div class="line">O'erstunk their feet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">This was well done, my bird.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy shape invisible retain thou still:</div>
                     <div class="line">The trumpery in my house, go bring it hither,</div>
                     <div class="line">For stale to catch these thieves.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">I go, I go.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">A devil, a born devil, on whose nature</div>
                     <div class="line">Nurture can never stick; on whom my pains,</div>
                     <div class="line">Humanely taken, all, all lost, quite lost;</div>
                     <div class="line">And as with age his body uglier grows,</div>
                     <div class="line">So his mind cankers. I will plague them all,</div>
                     <div class="line">Even to roaring.</div>
                     <p>Re-enter ARIEL, loaden with glistering apparel, &c</p>
                     <div class="line">Come, hang them on this line.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>PROSPERO and ARIEL remain invisible. Enter
CALIBAN, STEPHANO, and TRINCULO, all wet</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray you, tread softly, that the blind mole may not</div>
                     <div class="line">Hear a foot fall: we now are near his cell.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Monster, your fairy, which you say is</div>
                     <div class="line">a harmless fairy, has done little better than</div>
                     <div class="line">played the Jack with us.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Monster, I do smell all horse-piss; at</div>
                     <div class="line">which my nose is in great indignation.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">So is mine. Do you hear, monster? If I should take</div>
                     <div class="line">a displeasure against you, look you,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou wert but a lost monster.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Good my lord, give me thy favour still.</div>
                     <div class="line">Be patient, for the prize I'll bring thee to</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall hoodwink this mischance: therefore speak softly.</div>
                     <div class="line">All's hush'd as midnight yet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, but to lose our bottles in the pool,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">There is not only disgrace and dishonour in that,</div>
                     <div class="line">monster, but an infinite loss.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">That's more to me than my wetting: yet this is your</div>
                     <div class="line">harmless fairy, monster.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">I will fetch off my bottle, though I be o'er ears</div>
                     <div class="line">for my labour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Prithee, my king, be quiet. Seest thou here,</div>
                     <div class="line">This is the mouth o' the cell: no noise, and enter.</div>
                     <div class="line">Do that good mischief which may make this island</div>
                     <div class="line">Thine own for ever, and I, thy Caliban,</div>
                     <div class="line">For aye thy foot-licker.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Give me thy hand. I do begin to have bloody thoughts.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">O king Stephano! O peer! O worthy Stephano! look</div>
                     <div class="line">what a wardrobe here is for thee!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Let it alone, thou fool; it is but trash.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, ho, monster! we know what belongs to a frippery.</div>
                     <div class="line">O king Stephano!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Put off that gown, Trinculo; by this hand, I'll have</div>
                     <div class="line">that gown.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy grace shall have it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">The dropsy drown this fool I what do you mean</div>
                     <div class="line">To dote thus on such luggage? Let's alone</div>
                     <div class="line">And do the murder first: if he awake,</div>
                     <div class="line">From toe to crown he'll fill our skins with pinches,</div>
                     <div class="line">Make us strange stuff.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Be you quiet, monster. Mistress line,</div>
                     <div class="line">is not this my jerkin? Now is the jerkin under</div>
                     <div class="line">the line: now, jerkin, you are like to lose your</div>
                     <div class="line">hair and prove a bald jerkin.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Do, do: we steal by line and level, an't like your grace.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">I thank thee for that jest; here's a garment for't:</div>
                     <div class="line">wit shall not go unrewarded while I am king of this</div>
                     <div class="line">country. 'Steal by line and level' is an excellent</div>
                     <div class="line">pass of pate; there's another garment for't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">Monster, come, put some lime upon your fingers, and</div>
                     <div class="line">away with the rest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I will have none on't: we shall lose our time,</div>
                     <div class="line">And all be turn'd to barnacles, or to apes</div>
                     <div class="line">With foreheads villanous low.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Monster, lay-to your fingers: help to bear this</div>
                     <div class="line">away where my hogshead of wine is, or I'll turn you</div>
                     <div class="line">out of my kingdom: go to, carry this.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">And this.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, and this.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>A noise of hunters heard. Enter divers Spirits,
in shape of dogs and hounds, and hunt them about,
PROSPERO and ARIEL setting them on</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hey, Mountain, hey!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">Silver I there it goes, Silver!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Fury, Fury! there, Tyrant, there! hark! hark!</div>
                     <p>CALIBAN, STEPHANO, and TRINCULO, are
driven out</p>
                     <div class="line">Go charge my goblins that they grind their joints</div>
                     <div class="line">With dry convulsions, shorten up their sinews</div>
                     <div class="line">With aged cramps, and more pinch-spotted make them</div>
                     <div class="line">Than pard or cat o' mountain.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">Hark, they roar!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Let them be hunted soundly. At this hour</div>
                     <div class="line">Lie at my mercy all mine enemies:</div>
                     <div class="line">Shortly shall all my labours end, and thou</div>
                     <div class="line">Shalt have the air at freedom: for a little</div>
                     <div class="line">Follow, and do me service.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.7">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 5. ACT V</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.3">2. EPILOGUE</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter PROSPERO in his magic robes, and ARIEL</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now does my project gather to a head:</div>
                     <div class="line">My charms crack not; my spirits obey; and time</div>
                     <div class="line">Goes upright with his carriage. How's the day?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">On the sixth hour; at which time, my lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">You said our work should cease.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">I did say so,</div>
                     <div class="line">When first I raised the tempest. Say, my spirit,</div>
                     <div class="line">How fares the king and's followers?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">Confined together</div>
                     <div class="line">In the same fashion as you gave in charge,</div>
                     <div class="line">Just as you left them; all prisoners, sir,</div>
                     <div class="line">In the line-grove which weather-fends your cell;</div>
                     <div class="line">They cannot budge till your release. The king,</div>
                     <div class="line">His brother and yours, abide all three distracted</div>
                     <div class="line">And the remainder mourning over them,</div>
                     <div class="line">Brimful of sorrow and dismay; but chiefly</div>
                     <div class="line">Him that you term'd, sir, 'The good old lord Gonzalo;'</div>
                     <div class="line">His tears run down his beard, like winter's drops</div>
                     <div class="line">From eaves of reeds. Your charm so strongly works 'em</div>
                     <div class="line">That if you now beheld them, your affections</div>
                     <div class="line">Would become tender.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Dost thou think so, spirit?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">Mine would, sir, were I human.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">And mine shall.</div>
                     <div class="line">Hast thou, which art but air, a touch, a feeling</div>
                     <div class="line">Of their afflictions, and shall not myself,</div>
                     <div class="line">One of their kind, that relish all as sharply,</div>
                     <div class="line">Passion as they, be kindlier moved than thou art?</div>
                     <div class="line">Though with their high wrongs I am struck to the quick,</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet with my nobler reason 'gaitist my fury</div>
                     <div class="line">Do I take part: the rarer action is</div>
                     <div class="line">In virtue than in vengeance: they being penitent,</div>
                     <div class="line">The sole drift of my purpose doth extend</div>
                     <div class="line">Not a frown further. Go release them, Ariel:</div>
                     <div class="line">My charms I'll break, their senses I'll restore,</div>
                     <div class="line">And they shall be themselves.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll fetch them, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ye elves of hills, brooks, standing lakes and groves,</div>
                     <div class="line">And ye that on the sands with printless foot</div>
                     <div class="line">Do chase the ebbing Neptune and do fly him</div>
                     <div class="line">When he comes back; you demi-puppets that</div>
                     <div class="line">By moonshine do the green sour ringlets make,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whereof the ewe not bites, and you whose pastime</div>
                     <div class="line">Is to make midnight mushrooms, that rejoice</div>
                     <div class="line">To hear the solemn curfew; by whose aid,</div>
                     <div class="line">Weak masters though ye be, I have bedimm'd</div>
                     <div class="line">The noontide sun, call'd forth the mutinous winds,</div>
                     <div class="line">And 'twixt the green sea and the azured vault</div>
                     <div class="line">Set roaring war: to the dread rattling thunder</div>
                     <div class="line">Have I given fire and rifted Jove's stout oak</div>
                     <div class="line">With his own bolt; the strong-based promontory</div>
                     <div class="line">Have I made shake and by the spurs pluck'd up</div>
                     <div class="line">The pine and cedar: graves at my command</div>
                     <div class="line">Have waked their sleepers, oped, and let 'em forth</div>
                     <div class="line">By my so potent art. But this rough magic</div>
                     <div class="line">I here abjure, and, when I have required</div>
                     <div class="line">Some heavenly music, which even now I do,</div>
                     <div class="line">To work mine end upon their senses that</div>
                     <div class="line">This airy charm is for, I'll break my staff,</div>
                     <div class="line">Bury it certain fathoms in the earth,</div>
                     <div class="line">And deeper than did ever plummet sound</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll drown my book.</div>
                     <p>Solemn music</p>
                     <p>Re-enter ARIEL before: then ALONSO, with a
frantic gesture, attended by GONZALO;
SEBASTIAN and ANTONIO in like manner,
attended by ADRIAN and FRANCISCO   they all
enter the circle which PROSPERO had made,
and there stand charmed; which PROSPERO
observing, speaks:</p>
                     <div class="line">A solemn air and the best comforter</div>
                     <div class="line">To an unsettled fancy cure thy brains,</div>
                     <div class="line">Now useless, boil'd within thy skull! There stand,</div>
                     <div class="line">For you are spell-stopp'd.</div>
                     <div class="line">Holy Gonzalo, honourable man,</div>
                     <div class="line">Mine eyes, even sociable to the show of thine,</div>
                     <div class="line">Fall fellowly drops. The charm dissolves apace,</div>
                     <div class="line">And as the morning steals upon the night,</div>
                     <div class="line">Melting the darkness, so their rising senses</div>
                     <div class="line">Begin to chase the ignorant fumes that mantle</div>
                     <div class="line">Their clearer reason. O good Gonzalo,</div>
                     <div class="line">My true preserver, and a loyal sir</div>
                     <div class="line">To him you follow'st! I will pay thy graces</div>
                     <div class="line">Home both in word and deed. Most cruelly</div>
                     <div class="line">Didst thou, Alonso, use me and my daughter:</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy brother was a furtherer in the act.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou art pinch'd fort now, Sebastian. Flesh and blood,</div>
                     <div class="line">You, brother mine, that entertain'd ambition,</div>
                     <div class="line">Expell'd remorse and nature; who, with Sebastian,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose inward pinches therefore are most strong,</div>
                     <div class="line">Would here have kill'd your king; I do forgive thee,</div>
                     <div class="line">Unnatural though thou art. Their understanding</div>
                     <div class="line">Begins to swell, and the approaching tide</div>
                     <div class="line">Will shortly fill the reasonable shore</div>
                     <div class="line">That now lies foul and muddy. Not one of them</div>
                     <div class="line">That yet looks on me, or would know me Ariel,</div>
                     <div class="line">Fetch me the hat and rapier in my cell:</div>
                     <div class="line">I will discase me, and myself present</div>
                     <div class="line">As I was sometime Milan: quickly, spirit;</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou shalt ere long be free.</div>
                     <p>ARIEL sings and helps to attire him</p>
                     <div class="line">Where the bee sucks. there suck I:</div>
                     <div class="line">In a cowslip's bell I lie;</div>
                     <div class="line">There I couch when owls do cry.</div>
                     <div class="line">On the bat's back I do fly</div>
                     <div class="line">After summer merrily.</div>
                     <div class="line">Merrily, merrily shall I live now</div>
                     <div class="line">Under the blossom that hangs on the bough.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, that's my dainty Ariel! I shall miss thee:</div>
                     <div class="line">But yet thou shalt have freedom: so, so, so.</div>
                     <div class="line">To the king's ship, invisible as thou art:</div>
                     <div class="line">There shalt thou find the mariners asleep</div>
                     <div class="line">Under the hatches; the master and the boatswain</div>
                     <div class="line">Being awake, enforce them to this place,</div>
                     <div class="line">And presently, I prithee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">I drink the air before me, and return</div>
                     <div class="line">Or ere your pulse twice beat.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">All torment, trouble, wonder and amazement</div>
                     <div class="line">Inhabits here: some heavenly power guide us</div>
                     <div class="line">Out of this fearful country!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Behold, sir king,</div>
                     <div class="line">The wronged Duke of Milan, Prospero:</div>
                     <div class="line">For more assurance that a living prince</div>
                     <div class="line">Does now speak to thee, I embrace thy body;</div>
                     <div class="line">And to thee and thy company I bid</div>
                     <div class="line">A hearty welcome.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Whether thou best he or no,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or some enchanted trifle to abuse me,</div>
                     <div class="line">As late I have been, I not know: thy pulse</div>
                     <div class="line">Beats as of flesh and blood; and, since I saw thee,</div>
                     <div class="line">The affliction of my mind amends, with which,</div>
                     <div class="line">I fear, a madness held me: this must crave,</div>
                     <div class="line">An if this be at all, a most strange story.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy dukedom I resign and do entreat</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou pardon me my wrongs. But how should Prospero</div>
                     <div class="line">Be living and be here?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">First, noble friend,</div>
                     <div class="line">Let me embrace thine age, whose honour cannot</div>
                     <div class="line">Be measured or confined.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Whether this be</div>
                     <div class="line">Or be not, I'll not swear.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">You do yet taste</div>
                     <div class="line">Some subtilties o' the isle, that will not let you</div>
                     <div class="line">Believe things certain. Welcome, my friends all!</div>
                     <p>Aside to SEBASTIAN and ANTONIO</p>
                     <div class="line">But you, my brace of lords, were I so minded,</div>
                     <div class="line">I here could pluck his highness' frown upon you</div>
                     <div class="line">And justify you traitors: at this time</div>
                     <div class="line">I will tell no tales.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  The devil speaks in him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">No.</div>
                     <div class="line">For you, most wicked sir, whom to call brother</div>
                     <div class="line">Would even infect my mouth, I do forgive</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy rankest fault; all of them; and require</div>
                     <div class="line">My dukedom of thee, which perforce, I know,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou must restore.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">If thou be'st Prospero,</div>
                     <div class="line">Give us particulars of thy preservation;</div>
                     <div class="line">How thou hast met us here, who three hours since</div>
                     <div class="line">Were wreck'd upon this shore; where I have lost--</div>
                     <div class="line">How sharp the point of this remembrance is!--</div>
                     <div class="line">My dear son Ferdinand.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">I am woe for't, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Irreparable is the loss, and patience</div>
                     <div class="line">Says it is past her cure.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">I rather think</div>
                     <div class="line">You have not sought her help, of whose soft grace</div>
                     <div class="line">For the like loss I have her sovereign aid</div>
                     <div class="line">And rest myself content.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">You the like loss!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">As great to me as late; and, supportable</div>
                     <div class="line">To make the dear loss, have I means much weaker</div>
                     <div class="line">Than you may call to comfort you, for I</div>
                     <div class="line">Have lost my daughter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">A daughter?</div>
                     <div class="line">O heavens, that they were living both in Naples,</div>
                     <div class="line">The king and queen there! that they were, I wish</div>
                     <div class="line">Myself were mudded in that oozy bed</div>
                     <div class="line">Where my son lies. When did you lose your daughter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">In this last tempest. I perceive these lords</div>
                     <div class="line">At this encounter do so much admire</div>
                     <div class="line">That they devour their reason and scarce think</div>
                     <div class="line">Their eyes do offices of truth, their words</div>
                     <div class="line">Are natural breath: but, howsoe'er you have</div>
                     <div class="line">Been justled from your senses, know for certain</div>
                     <div class="line">That I am Prospero and that very duke</div>
                     <div class="line">Which was thrust forth of Milan, who most strangely</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon this shore, where you were wreck'd, was landed,</div>
                     <div class="line">To be the lord on't. No more yet of this;</div>
                     <div class="line">For 'tis a chronicle of day by day,</div>
                     <div class="line">Not a relation for a breakfast nor</div>
                     <div class="line">Befitting this first meeting. Welcome, sir;</div>
                     <div class="line">This cell's my court: here have I few attendants</div>
                     <div class="line">And subjects none abroad: pray you, look in.</div>
                     <div class="line">My dukedom since you have given me again,</div>
                     <div class="line">I will requite you with as good a thing;</div>
                     <div class="line">At least bring forth a wonder, to content ye</div>
                     <div class="line">As much as me my dukedom.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Here PROSPERO discovers FERDINAND and MIRANDA
playing at chess</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet lord, you play me false.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">No, my dear'st love,</div>
                     <div class="line">I would not for the world.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes, for a score of kingdoms you should wrangle,</div>
                     <div class="line">And I would call it, fair play.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">If this prove</div>
                     <div class="line">A vision of the Island, one dear son</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall I twice lose.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">A most high miracle!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Though the seas threaten, they are merciful;</div>
                     <div class="line">I have cursed them without cause.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Kneels</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now all the blessings</div>
                     <div class="line">Of a glad father compass thee about!</div>
                     <div class="line">Arise, and say how thou camest here.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, wonder!</div>
                     <div class="line">How many goodly creatures are there here!</div>
                     <div class="line">How beauteous mankind is! O brave new world,</div>
                     <div class="line">That has such people in't!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis new to thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">What is this maid with whom thou wast at play?</div>
                     <div class="line">Your eld'st acquaintance cannot be three hours:</div>
                     <div class="line">Is she the goddess that hath sever'd us,</div>
                     <div class="line">And brought us thus together?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, she is mortal;</div>
                     <div class="line">But by immortal Providence she's mine:</div>
                     <div class="line">I chose her when I could not ask my father</div>
                     <div class="line">For his advice, nor thought I had one. She</div>
                     <div class="line">Is daughter to this famous Duke of Milan,</div>
                     <div class="line">Of whom so often I have heard renown,</div>
                     <div class="line">But never saw before; of whom I have</div>
                     <div class="line">Received a second life; and second father</div>
                     <div class="line">This lady makes him to me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">I am hers:</div>
                     <div class="line">But, O, how oddly will it sound that I</div>
                     <div class="line">Must ask my child forgiveness!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">There, sir, stop:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let us not burthen our remembrance with</div>
                     <div class="line">A heaviness that's gone.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">I have inly wept,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or should have spoke ere this. Look down, you god,</div>
                     <div class="line">And on this couple drop a blessed crown!</div>
                     <div class="line">For it is you that have chalk'd forth the way</div>
                     <div class="line">Which brought us hither.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">I say, Amen, Gonzalo!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Was Milan thrust from Milan, that his issue</div>
                     <div class="line">Should become kings of Naples? O, rejoice</div>
                     <div class="line">Beyond a common joy, and set it down</div>
                     <div class="line">With gold on lasting pillars: In one voyage</div>
                     <div class="line">Did Claribel her husband find at Tunis,</div>
                     <div class="line">And Ferdinand, her brother, found a wife</div>
                     <div class="line">Where he himself was lost, Prospero his dukedom</div>
                     <div class="line">In a poor isle and all of us ourselves</div>
                     <div class="line">When no man was his own.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>To FERDINAND and MIRANDA</span>  Give me your hands:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let grief and sorrow still embrace his heart</div>
                     <div class="line">That doth not wish you joy!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                     <div class="line">Be it so! Amen!</div>
                     <p>Re-enter ARIEL, with the Master and Boatswain
amazedly following</p>
                     <div class="line">O, look, sir, look, sir! here is more of us:</div>
                     <div class="line">I prophesied, if a gallows were on land,</div>
                     <div class="line">This fellow could not drown. Now, blasphemy,</div>
                     <div class="line">That swear'st grace o'erboard, not an oath on shore?</div>
                     <div class="line">Hast thou no mouth by land? What is the news?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Boatswain</div>
                     <div class="line">The best news is, that we have safely found</div>
                     <div class="line">Our king and company; the next, our ship--</div>
                     <div class="line">Which, but three glasses since, we gave out split--</div>
                     <div class="line">Is tight and yare and bravely rigg'd as when</div>
                     <div class="line">We first put out to sea.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to PROSPERO</span>  Sir, all this service</div>
                     <div class="line">Have I done since I went.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to ARIEL</span>  My tricksy spirit!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">These are not natural events; they strengthen</div>
                     <div class="line">From strange to stranger. Say, how came you hither?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Boatswain</div>
                     <div class="line">If I did think, sir, I were well awake,</div>
                     <div class="line">I'ld strive to tell you. We were dead of sleep,</div>
                     <div class="line">And--how we know not--all clapp'd under hatches;</div>
                     <div class="line">Where but even now with strange and several noises</div>
                     <div class="line">Of roaring, shrieking, howling, jingling chains,</div>
                     <div class="line">And more diversity of sounds, all horrible,</div>
                     <div class="line">We were awaked; straightway, at liberty;</div>
                     <div class="line">Where we, in all her trim, freshly beheld</div>
                     <div class="line">Our royal, good and gallant ship, our master</div>
                     <div class="line">Capering to eye her: on a trice, so please you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Even in a dream, were we divided from them</div>
                     <div class="line">And were brought moping hither.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to PROSPERO</span>          Was't well done?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to ARIEL</span>  Bravely, my diligence. Thou shalt be free.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">This is as strange a maze as e'er men trod</div>
                     <div class="line">And there is in this business more than nature</div>
                     <div class="line">Was ever conduct of: some oracle</div>
                     <div class="line">Must rectify our knowledge.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, my liege,</div>
                     <div class="line">Do not infest your mind with beating on</div>
                     <div class="line">The strangeness of this business; at pick'd leisure</div>
                     <div class="line">Which shall be shortly, single I'll resolve you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which to you shall seem probable, of every</div>
                     <div class="line">These happen'd accidents; till when, be cheerful</div>
                     <div class="line">And think of each thing well.</div>
                     <p>Aside to ARIEL</p>
                     <div class="line">Come hither, spirit:</div>
                     <div class="line">Set Caliban and his companions free;</div>
                     <div class="line">Untie the spell.</div>
                     <p>Exit ARIEL</p>
                     <div class="line">How fares my gracious sir?</div>
                     <div class="line">There are yet missing of your company</div>
                     <div class="line">Some few odd lads that you remember not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter ARIEL, driving in CALIBAN, STEPHANO
and TRINCULO, in their stolen apparel</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Every man shift for all the rest, and</div>
                     <div class="line">let no man take care for himself; for all is</div>
                     <div class="line">but fortune. Coragio, bully-monster, coragio!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">If these be true spies which I wear in my head,</div>
                     <div class="line">here's a goodly sight.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">O Setebos, these be brave spirits indeed!</div>
                     <div class="line">How fine my master is! I am afraid</div>
                     <div class="line">He will chastise me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Ha, ha!</div>
                     <div class="line">What things are these, my lord Antonio?</div>
                     <div class="line">Will money buy 'em?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Very like; one of them</div>
                     <div class="line">Is a plain fish, and, no doubt, marketable.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Mark but the badges of these men, my lords,</div>
                     <div class="line">Then say if they be true. This mis-shapen knave,</div>
                     <div class="line">His mother was a witch, and one so strong</div>
                     <div class="line">That could control the moon, make flows and ebbs,</div>
                     <div class="line">And deal in her command without her power.</div>
                     <div class="line">These three have robb'd me; and this demi-devil--</div>
                     <div class="line">For he's a bastard one--had plotted with them</div>
                     <div class="line">To take my life. Two of these fellows you</div>
                     <div class="line">Must know and own; this thing of darkness!</div>
                     <div class="line">Acknowledge mine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall be pinch'd to death.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Is not this Stephano, my drunken butler?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">He is drunk now: where had he wine?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">And Trinculo is reeling ripe: where should they</div>
                     <div class="line">Find this grand liquor that hath gilded 'em?</div>
                     <div class="line">How camest thou in this pickle?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                     <div class="line">I have been in such a pickle since I</div>
                     <div class="line">saw you last that, I fear me, will never out of</div>
                     <div class="line">my bones: I shall not fear fly-blowing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, how now, Stephano!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, touch me not; I am not Stephano, but a cramp.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">You'ld be king o' the isle, sirrah?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                     <div class="line">I should have been a sore one then.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">This is a strange thing as e'er I look'd on.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Pointing to Caliban</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">He is as disproportion'd in his manners</div>
                     <div class="line">As in his shape. Go, sirrah, to my cell;</div>
                     <div class="line">Take with you your companions; as you look</div>
                     <div class="line">To have my pardon, trim it handsomely.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, that I will; and I'll be wise hereafter</div>
                     <div class="line">And seek for grace. What a thrice-double ass</div>
                     <div class="line">Was I, to take this drunkard for a god</div>
                     <div class="line">And worship this dull fool!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Go to; away!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hence, and bestow your luggage where you found it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                     <div class="line">Or stole it, rather.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt CALIBAN, STEPHANO, and TRINCULO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, I invite your highness and your train</div>
                     <div class="line">To my poor cell, where you shall take your rest</div>
                     <div class="line">For this one night; which, part of it, I'll waste</div>
                     <div class="line">With such discourse as, I not doubt, shall make it</div>
                     <div class="line">Go quick away; the story of my life</div>
                     <div class="line">And the particular accidents gone by</div>
                     <div class="line">Since I came to this isle: and in the morn</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll bring you to your ship and so to Naples,</div>
                     <div class="line">Where I have hope to see the nuptial</div>
                     <div class="line">Of these our dear-beloved solemnized;</div>
                     <div class="line">And thence retire me to my Milan, where</div>
                     <div class="line">Every third thought shall be my grave.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                     <div class="line">I long</div>
                     <div class="line">To hear the story of your life, which must</div>
                     <div class="line">Take the ear strangely.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll deliver all;</div>
                     <div class="line">And promise you calm seas, auspicious gales</div>
                     <div class="line">And sail so expeditious that shall catch</div>
