                     <div class="line">Your royal fleet far off.</div>
                     <p>Aside to ARIEL</p>
                     <div class="line">My Ariel, chick,</div>
                     <div class="line">That is thy charge: then to the elements</div>
                     <div class="line">Be free, and fare thou well! Please you, draw near.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. EPILOGUE</h2>
                  <h4>SPOKEN BY PROSPERO</h4>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">[PROSPERO]</div>
                     <div class="line">Now my charms are all o'erthrown,</div>
                     <div class="line">And what strength I have's mine own,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which is most faint: now, 'tis true,</div>
                     <div class="line">I must be here confined by you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or sent to Naples. Let me not,</div>
                     <div class="line">Since I have my dukedom got</div>
                     <div class="line">And pardon'd the deceiver, dwell</div>
                     <div class="line">In this bare island by your spell;</div>
                     <div class="line">But release me from my bands</div>
                     <div class="line">With the help of your good hands:</div>
                     <div class="line">Gentle breath of yours my sails</div>
                     <div class="line">Must fill, or else my project fails,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which was to please. Now I want</div>
                     <div class="line">Spirits to enforce, art to enchant,</div>
                     <div class="line">And my ending is despair,</div>
                     <div class="line">Unless I be relieved by prayer,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which pierces so that it assaults</div>
                     <div class="line">Mercy itself and frees all faults.</div>
                     <div class="line">As you from crimes would pardon'd be,</div>
                     <div class="line">Let your indulgence set me free.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
            </section>
         </article>
      </article>
      <script src="../../resources/js/prism.js"/>
   </body>
</html>

      <script src="../../resources/js/dbmodnizr.js" type="text/javascript"/>
      <title>The Tempest</title>
   </head>
   <body>
      <article class="book" id="R.1">
         <header class="book-titlepage">
            <h1>The Tempest</h1>
         </header>
         <div class="lists-of-titles">
            <div class="toc">

               </p>
               <ul class="toc">

                           </span>
                        </li>

                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.3">2. SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.</a>
                           </span>

                     </ul>

                  <li>

                              <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  Another part of the island.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  Another part of the island.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
                  <li>
                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.5">3. ACT III</a>
                     </span>
                     <ul class="toc">

                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S Cell.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  Another part of the island.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  Another part of the island.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
                  <li>
                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.6">4. ACT IV</a>
                     </span>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
                  <li>
                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.7">5. ACT V</a>
                     </span>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.3">2. EPILOGUE</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
               </ul>
            </div>
         </div>
         <div class="content">
            <article class="preface" id="R.1.2">
               <header class="preface-titlepage">
                  <h2>Dramatis Personae</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="content">
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">ALONSO, King of Naples.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">SEBASTIAN, his brother.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">PROSPERO, the right Duke of Milan.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">ANTONIO, his brother, the usurping Duke of Milan.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">FERDINAND, son to the King of Naples.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">GONZALO, an honest old Counsellor.</span>
                  </p>
                  <table border="0" class="simplelist" summary="Simple list">
                     <tr>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">
                              <span class="personname">ADRIAN</span>
                              <span class="personname">FRANCISCO</span>
                           </span>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">Lords.</span>
                        </td>
                     </tr>
                  </table>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">CALIBAN, a savage and deformed Slave.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">TRINCULO, a Jester.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">STEPHANO, a drunken Butler.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Master of a Ship. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Boatswain. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Mariners. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">MIRANDA, daughter to Prospero.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">ARIEL, an airy Spirit.</span>
                  </p>
                  <table border="0" class="simplelist" summary="Simple list">
                     <tr>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">
                              <span class="personname">IRIS</span>
                              <span class="personname">CERES</span>
                              <span class="personname">JUNO</span>
                              <span class="personname">Nymphs</span>
                              <span class="personname">Reapers</span>
                           </span>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">presented by Spirits.</span>
                        </td>
                     </tr>
                  </table>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Other Spirits attending on Prospero.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>SCENE  A ship at Sea: an island.</p>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.3">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 1. ACT I</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.2">1. SCENE I.  On a ship at sea: a tempestuous noise of thunder and lightning heard.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.3">2. SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  On a ship at sea: a tempestuous noise of thunder and lightning heard.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter a Master and a Boatswain</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Master</div>
                              <div class="line">Boatswain!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Boatswain</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, master: what cheer?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Master</div>
                              <div class="line">Good, speak to the mariners: fall to't, yarely,</div>
                              <div class="line">or we run ourselves aground: bestir, bestir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Enter Mariners</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Boatswain</div>
                              <div class="line">Heigh, my hearts! cheerly, cheerly, my hearts!</div>
                              <div class="line">yare, yare! Take in the topsail. Tend to the</div>
                              <div class="line">master's whistle. Blow, till thou burst thy wind,</div>
                              <div class="line">if room enough!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, FERDINAND,
GONZALO, and others</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good boatswain, have care. Where's the master?</div>
                              <div class="line">Play the men.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Boatswain</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray now, keep below.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is the master, boatswain?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Boatswain</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you not hear him? You mar our labour: keep your</div>
                              <div class="line">cabins: you do assist the storm.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, good, be patient.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Boatswain</div>
                              <div class="line">When the sea is. Hence! What cares these roarers</div>
                              <div class="line">for the name of king? To cabin: silence! trouble us not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good, yet remember whom thou hast aboard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Boatswain</div>
                              <div class="line">None that I more love than myself. You are a</div>
                              <div class="line">counsellor; if you can command these elements to</div>
                              <div class="line">silence, and work the peace of the present, we will</div>
                              <div class="line">not hand a rope more; use your authority: if you</div>
                              <div class="line">cannot, give thanks you have lived so long, and make</div>
                              <div class="line">yourself ready in your cabin for the mischance of</div>
                              <div class="line">the hour, if it so hap. Cheerly, good hearts! Out</div>
                              <div class="line">of our way, I say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">I have great comfort from this fellow: methinks he</div>
                              <div class="line">hath no drowning mark upon him; his complexion is</div>
                              <div class="line">perfect gallows. Stand fast, good Fate, to his</div>
                              <div class="line">hanging: make the rope of his destiny our cable,</div>
                              <div class="line">for our own doth little advantage. If he be not</div>
                              <div class="line">born to be hanged, our case is miserable.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                        <p>Re-enter Boatswain</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Boatswain</div>
                              <div class="line">Down with the topmast! yare! lower, lower! Bring</div>
                              <div class="line">her to try with main-course.</div>
                              <p>A cry within</p>
                              <div class="line">A plague upon this howling! they are louder than</div>
                              <div class="line">the weather or our office.</div>
                              <p>Re-enter SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, and GONZALO</p>
                              <div class="line">Yet again! what do you here? Shall we give o'er</div>
                              <div class="line">and drown? Have you a mind to sink?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">A pox o' your throat, you bawling, blasphemous,</div>
                              <div class="line">incharitable dog!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Boatswain</div>
                              <div class="line">Work you then.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang, cur! hang, you whoreson, insolent noisemaker!</div>
                              <div class="line">We are less afraid to be drowned than thou art.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll warrant him for drowning; though the ship were</div>
                              <div class="line">no stronger than a nutshell and as leaky as an</div>
                              <div class="line">unstanched wench.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Boatswain</div>
                              <div class="line">Lay her a-hold, a-hold! set her two courses off to</div>
                              <div class="line">sea again; lay her off.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter Mariners wet</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Mariners</div>
                              <div class="line">All lost! to prayers, to prayers! all lost!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Boatswain</div>
                              <div class="line">What, must our mouths be cold?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">The king and prince at prayers! let's assist them,</div>
                              <div class="line">For our case is as theirs.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I'm out of patience.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">We are merely cheated of our lives by drunkards:</div>
                              <div class="line">This wide-chapp'd rascal--would thou mightst lie drowning</div>
                              <div class="line">The washing of ten tides!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">He'll be hang'd yet,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though every drop of water swear against it</div>
                              <div class="line">And gape at widest to glut him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>A confused noise within:   'Mercy on us!'--
'We split, we split!'--'Farewell, my wife and
children!'--
'Farewell, brother!'--'We split, we split, we split!'</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's all sink with the king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's take leave of him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt ANTONIO and SEBASTIAN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Now would I give a thousand furlongs of sea for an</div>
                              <div class="line">acre of barren ground, long heath, brown furze, any</div>
                              <div class="line">thing. The wills above be done! but I would fain</div>
                              <div class="line">die a dry death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter PROSPERO and MIRANDA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">If by your art, my dearest father, you have</div>
                              <div class="line">Put the wild waters in this roar, allay them.</div>
                              <div class="line">The sky, it seems, would pour down stinking pitch,</div>
                              <div class="line">But that the sea, mounting to the welkin's cheek,</div>
                              <div class="line">Dashes the fire out. O, I have suffered</div>
                              <div class="line">With those that I saw suffer: a brave vessel,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who had, no doubt, some noble creature in her,</div>
                              <div class="line">Dash'd all to pieces. O, the cry did knock</div>
                              <div class="line">Against my very heart. Poor souls, they perish'd.</div>
                              <div class="line">Had I been any god of power, I would</div>
                              <div class="line">Have sunk the sea within the earth or ere</div>
                              <div class="line">It should the good ship so have swallow'd and</div>
                              <div class="line">The fraughting souls within her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Be collected:</div>
                              <div class="line">No more amazement: tell your piteous heart</div>
                              <div class="line">There's no harm done.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, woe the day!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">No harm.</div>
                              <div class="line">I have done nothing but in care of thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of thee, my dear one, thee, my daughter, who</div>
                              <div class="line">Art ignorant of what thou art, nought knowing</div>
                              <div class="line">Of whence I am, nor that I am more better</div>
                              <div class="line">Than Prospero, master of a full poor cell,</div>
                              <div class="line">And thy no greater father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">More to know</div>
                              <div class="line">Did never meddle with my thoughts.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis time</div>
                              <div class="line">I should inform thee farther. Lend thy hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">And pluck my magic garment from me. So:</div>
                              <p>Lays down his mantle</p>
                              <div class="line">Lie there, my art. Wipe thou thine eyes; have comfort.</div>
                              <div class="line">The direful spectacle of the wreck, which touch'd</div>
                              <div class="line">The very virtue of compassion in thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">I have with such provision in mine art</div>
                              <div class="line">So safely ordered that there is no soul--</div>
                              <div class="line">No, not so much perdition as an hair</div>
                              <div class="line">Betid to any creature in the vessel</div>
                              <div class="line">Which thou heard'st cry, which thou saw'st sink. Sit down;</div>
                              <div class="line">For thou must now know farther.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">You have often</div>
                              <div class="line">Begun to tell me what I am, but stopp'd</div>
                              <div class="line">And left me to a bootless inquisition,</div>
                              <div class="line">Concluding 'Stay: not yet.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">The hour's now come;</div>
                              <div class="line">The very minute bids thee ope thine ear;</div>
                              <div class="line">Obey and be attentive. Canst thou remember</div>
                              <div class="line">A time before we came unto this cell?</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not think thou canst, for then thou wast not</div>
                              <div class="line">Out three years old.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Certainly, sir, I can.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">By what? by any other house or person?</div>
                              <div class="line">Of any thing the image tell me that</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath kept with thy remembrance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis far off</div>
                              <div class="line">And rather like a dream than an assurance</div>
                              <div class="line">That my remembrance warrants. Had I not</div>
                              <div class="line">Four or five women once that tended me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hadst, and more, Miranda. But how is it</div>
                              <div class="line">That this lives in thy mind? What seest thou else</div>
                              <div class="line">In the dark backward and abysm of time?</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou remember'st aught ere thou camest here,</div>
                              <div class="line">How thou camest here thou mayst.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">But that I do not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Twelve year since, Miranda, twelve year since,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy father was the Duke of Milan and</div>
                              <div class="line">A prince of power.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, are not you my father?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy mother was a piece of virtue, and</div>
                              <div class="line">She said thou wast my daughter; and thy father</div>
                              <div class="line">Was Duke of Milan; and thou his only heir</div>
                              <div class="line">And princess no worse issued.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">O the heavens!</div>
                              <div class="line">What foul play had we, that we came from thence?</div>
                              <div class="line">Or blessed was't we did?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Both, both, my girl:</div>
                              <div class="line">By foul play, as thou say'st, were we heaved thence,</div>
                              <div class="line">But blessedly holp hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, my heart bleeds</div>
                              <div class="line">To think o' the teen that I have turn'd you to,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which is from my remembrance! Please you, farther.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">My brother and thy uncle, call'd Antonio--</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray thee, mark me--that a brother should</div>
                              <div class="line">Be so perfidious!--he whom next thyself</div>
                              <div class="line">Of all the world I loved and to him put</div>
                              <div class="line">The manage of my state; as at that time</div>
                              <div class="line">Through all the signories it was the first</div>
                              <div class="line">And Prospero the prime duke, being so reputed</div>
                              <div class="line">In dignity, and for the liberal arts</div>
                              <div class="line">Without a parallel; those being all my study,</div>
                              <div class="line">The government I cast upon my brother</div>
                              <div class="line">And to my state grew stranger, being transported</div>
                              <div class="line">And rapt in secret studies. Thy false uncle--</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou attend me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, most heedfully.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Being once perfected how to grant suits,</div>
                              <div class="line">How to deny them, who to advance and who</div>
                              <div class="line">To trash for over-topping, new created</div>
                              <div class="line">The creatures that were mine, I say, or changed 'em,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else new form'd 'em; having both the key</div>
                              <div class="line">Of officer and office, set all hearts i' the state</div>
                              <div class="line">To what tune pleased his ear; that now he was</div>
                              <div class="line">The ivy which had hid my princely trunk,</div>
                              <div class="line">And suck'd my verdure out on't. Thou attend'st not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, good sir, I do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray thee, mark me.</div>
                              <div class="line">I, thus neglecting worldly ends, all dedicated</div>
                              <div class="line">To closeness and the bettering of my mind</div>
                              <div class="line">With that which, but by being so retired,</div>
                              <div class="line">O'er-prized all popular rate, in my false brother</div>
                              <div class="line">Awaked an evil nature; and my trust,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like a good parent, did beget of him</div>
                              <div class="line">A falsehood in its contrary as great</div>
                              <div class="line">As my trust was; which had indeed no limit,</div>
                              <div class="line">A confidence sans bound. He being thus lorded,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not only with what my revenue yielded,</div>
                              <div class="line">But what my power might else exact, like one</div>
                              <div class="line">Who having into truth, by telling of it,</div>
                              <div class="line">Made such a sinner of his memory,</div>
                              <div class="line">To credit his own lie, he did believe</div>
                              <div class="line">He was indeed the duke; out o' the substitution</div>
                              <div class="line">And executing the outward face of royalty,</div>
                              <div class="line">With all prerogative: hence his ambition growing--</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou hear?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Your tale, sir, would cure deafness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">To have no screen between this part he play'd</div>
                              <div class="line">And him he play'd it for, he needs will be</div>
                              <div class="line">Absolute Milan. Me, poor man, my library</div>
                              <div class="line">Was dukedom large enough: of temporal royalties</div>
                              <div class="line">He thinks me now incapable; confederates--</div>
                              <div class="line">So dry he was for sway--wi' the King of Naples</div>
                              <div class="line">To give him annual tribute, do him homage,</div>
                              <div class="line">Subject his coronet to his crown and bend</div>
                              <div class="line">The dukedom yet unbow'd--alas, poor Milan!--</div>
                              <div class="line">To most ignoble stooping.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">O the heavens!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Mark his condition and the event; then tell me</div>
                              <div class="line">If this might be a brother.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">I should sin</div>
                              <div class="line">To think but nobly of my grandmother:</div>
                              <div class="line">Good wombs have borne bad sons.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Now the condition.</div>
                              <div class="line">The King of Naples, being an enemy</div>
                              <div class="line">To me inveterate, hearkens my brother's suit;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which was, that he, in lieu o' the premises</div>
                              <div class="line">Of homage and I know not how much tribute,</div>
                              <div class="line">Should presently extirpate me and mine</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of the dukedom and confer fair Milan</div>
                              <div class="line">With all the honours on my brother: whereon,</div>
                              <div class="line">A treacherous army levied, one midnight</div>
                              <div class="line">Fated to the purpose did Antonio open</div>
                              <div class="line">The gates of Milan, and, i' the dead of darkness,</div>
                              <div class="line">The ministers for the purpose hurried thence</div>
                              <div class="line">Me and thy crying self.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alack, for pity!</div>
                              <div class="line">I, not remembering how I cried out then,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will cry it o'er again: it is a hint</div>
                              <div class="line">That wrings mine eyes to't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear a little further</div>
                              <div class="line">And then I'll bring thee to the present business</div>
                              <div class="line">Which now's upon's; without the which this story</div>
                              <div class="line">Were most impertinent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore did they not</div>
                              <div class="line">That hour destroy us?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well demanded, wench:</div>
                              <div class="line">My tale provokes that question. Dear, they durst not,</div>
                              <div class="line">So dear the love my people bore me, nor set</div>
                              <div class="line">A mark so bloody on the business, but</div>
                              <div class="line">With colours fairer painted their foul ends.</div>
                              <div class="line">In few, they hurried us aboard a bark,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bore us some leagues to sea; where they prepared</div>
                              <div class="line">A rotten carcass of a boat, not rigg'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor tackle, sail, nor mast; the very rats</div>
                              <div class="line">Instinctively had quit it: there they hoist us,</div>
                              <div class="line">To cry to the sea that roar'd to us, to sigh</div>
                              <div class="line">To the winds whose pity, sighing back again,</div>
                              <div class="line">Did us but loving wrong.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alack, what trouble</div>
                              <div class="line">Was I then to you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, a cherubim</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou wast that did preserve me. Thou didst smile.</div>
                              <div class="line">Infused with a fortitude from heaven,</div>
                              <div class="line">When I have deck'd the sea with drops full salt,</div>
                              <div class="line">Under my burthen groan'd; which raised in me</div>
                              <div class="line">An undergoing stomach, to bear up</div>
                              <div class="line">Against what should ensue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">How came we ashore?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">By Providence divine.</div>
                              <div class="line">Some food we had and some fresh water that</div>
                              <div class="line">A noble Neapolitan, Gonzalo,</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of his charity, being then appointed</div>
                              <div class="line">Master of this design, did give us, with</div>
                              <div class="line">Rich garments, linens, stuffs and necessaries,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which since have steaded much; so, of his gentleness,</div>
                              <div class="line">Knowing I loved my books, he furnish'd me</div>
                              <div class="line">From mine own library with volumes that</div>
                              <div class="line">I prize above my dukedom.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Would I might</div>
                              <div class="line">But ever see that man!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Now I arise:</div>
                              <p>Resumes his mantle</p>
                              <div class="line">Sit still, and hear the last of our sea-sorrow.</div>
                              <div class="line">Here in this island we arrived; and here</div>
                              <div class="line">Have I, thy schoolmaster, made thee more profit</div>
                              <div class="line">Than other princesses can that have more time</div>
                              <div class="line">For vainer hours and tutors not so careful.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Heavens thank you for't! And now, I pray you, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">For still 'tis beating in my mind, your reason</div>
                              <div class="line">For raising this sea-storm?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Know thus far forth.</div>
                              <div class="line">By accident most strange, bountiful Fortune,</div>
                              <div class="line">Now my dear lady, hath mine enemies</div>
                              <div class="line">Brought to this shore; and by my prescience</div>
                              <div class="line">I find my zenith doth depend upon</div>
                              <div class="line">A most auspicious star, whose influence</div>
                              <div class="line">If now I court not but omit, my fortunes</div>
                              <div class="line">Will ever after droop. Here cease more questions:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art inclined to sleep; 'tis a good dulness,</div>
                              <div class="line">And give it way: I know thou canst not choose.</div>
                              <p>MIRANDA sleeps</p>
                              <div class="line">Come away, servant, come. I am ready now.</div>
                              <div class="line">Approach, my Ariel, come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ARIEL</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">All hail, great master! grave sir, hail! I come</div>
                              <div class="line">To answer thy best pleasure; be't to fly,</div>
                              <div class="line">To swim, to dive into the fire, to ride</div>
                              <div class="line">On the curl'd clouds, to thy strong bidding task</div>
                              <div class="line">Ariel and all his quality.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hast thou, spirit,</div>
                              <div class="line">Perform'd to point the tempest that I bade thee?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">To every article.</div>
                              <div class="line">I boarded the king's ship; now on the beak,</div>
                              <div class="line">Now in the waist, the deck, in every cabin,</div>
                              <div class="line">I flamed amazement: sometime I'ld divide,</div>
                              <div class="line">And burn in many places; on the topmast,</div>
                              <div class="line">The yards and bowsprit, would I flame distinctly,</div>
                              <div class="line">Then meet and join. Jove's lightnings, the precursors</div>
                              <div class="line">O' the dreadful thunder-claps, more momentary</div>
                              <div class="line">And sight-outrunning were not; the fire and cracks</div>
                              <div class="line">Of sulphurous roaring the most mighty Neptune</div>
                              <div class="line">Seem to besiege and make his bold waves tremble,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, his dread trident shake.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">My brave spirit!</div>
                              <div class="line">Who was so firm, so constant, that this coil</div>
                              <div class="line">Would not infect his reason?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Not a soul</div>
                              <div class="line">But felt a fever of the mad and play'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Some tricks of desperation. All but mariners</div>
                              <div class="line">Plunged in the foaming brine and quit the vessel,</div>
                              <div class="line">Then all afire with me: the king's son, Ferdinand,</div>
                              <div class="line">With hair up-staring,--then like reeds, not hair,--</div>
                              <div class="line">Was the first man that leap'd; cried, 'Hell is empty</div>
                              <div class="line">And all the devils are here.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why that's my spirit!</div>
                              <div class="line">But was not this nigh shore?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Close by, my master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">But are they, Ariel, safe?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Not a hair perish'd;</div>
                              <div class="line">On their sustaining garments not a blemish,</div>
                              <div class="line">But fresher than before: and, as thou badest me,</div>
                              <div class="line">In troops I have dispersed them 'bout the isle.</div>
                              <div class="line">The king's son have I landed by himself;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom I left cooling of the air with sighs</div>
                              <div class="line">In an odd angle of the isle and sitting,</div>
                              <div class="line">His arms in this sad knot.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Of the king's ship</div>
                              <div class="line">The mariners say how thou hast disposed</div>
                              <div class="line">And all the rest o' the fleet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Safely in harbour</div>
                              <div class="line">Is the king's ship; in the deep nook, where once</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou call'dst me up at midnight to fetch dew</div>
                              <div class="line">From the still-vex'd Bermoothes, there she's hid:</div>
                              <div class="line">The mariners all under hatches stow'd;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, with a charm join'd to their suffer'd labour,</div>
                              <div class="line">I have left asleep; and for the rest o' the fleet</div>
                              <div class="line">Which I dispersed, they all have met again</div>
                              <div class="line">And are upon the Mediterranean flote,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bound sadly home for Naples,</div>
                              <div class="line">Supposing that they saw the king's ship wreck'd</div>
                              <div class="line">And his great person perish.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ariel, thy charge</div>
                              <div class="line">Exactly is perform'd: but there's more work.</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the time o' the day?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Past the mid season.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">At least two glasses. The time 'twixt six and now</div>
                              <div class="line">Must by us both be spent most preciously.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Is there more toil? Since thou dost give me pains,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me remember thee what thou hast promised,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which is not yet perform'd me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">How now? moody?</div>
                              <div class="line">What is't thou canst demand?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">My liberty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Before the time be out? no more!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee,</div>
                              <div class="line">Remember I have done thee worthy service;</div>
                              <div class="line">Told thee no lies, made thee no mistakings, served</div>
                              <div class="line">Without or grudge or grumblings: thou didst promise</div>
                              <div class="line">To bate me a full year.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou forget</div>
                              <div class="line">From what a torment I did free thee?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">No.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou dost, and think'st it much to tread the ooze</div>
                              <div class="line">Of the salt deep,</div>
                              <div class="line">To run upon the sharp wind of the north,</div>
                              <div class="line">To do me business in the veins o' the earth</div>
                              <div class="line">When it is baked with frost.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou liest, malignant thing! Hast thou forgot</div>
                              <div class="line">The foul witch Sycorax, who with age and envy</div>
                              <div class="line">Was grown into a hoop? hast thou forgot her?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">No, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast. Where was she born? speak; tell me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, in Argier.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, was she so? I must</div>
                              <div class="line">Once in a month recount what thou hast been,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which thou forget'st. This damn'd witch Sycorax,</div>
                              <div class="line">For mischiefs manifold and sorceries terrible</div>
                              <div class="line">To enter human hearing, from Argier,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou know'st, was banish'd: for one thing she did</div>
                              <div class="line">They would not take her life. Is not this true?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">This blue-eyed hag was hither brought with child</div>
                              <div class="line">And here was left by the sailors. Thou, my slave,</div>
                              <div class="line">As thou report'st thyself, wast then her servant;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, for thou wast a spirit too delicate</div>
                              <div class="line">To act her earthy and abhorr'd commands,</div>
                              <div class="line">Refusing her grand hests, she did confine thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">By help of her more potent ministers</div>
                              <div class="line">And in her most unmitigable rage,</div>
                              <div class="line">Into a cloven pine; within which rift</div>
                              <div class="line">Imprison'd thou didst painfully remain</div>
                              <div class="line">A dozen years; within which space she died</div>
                              <div class="line">And left thee there; where thou didst vent thy groans</div>
                              <div class="line">As fast as mill-wheels strike. Then was this island--</div>
                              <div class="line">Save for the son that she did litter here,</div>
                              <div class="line">A freckled whelp hag-born--not honour'd with</div>
                              <div class="line">A human shape.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, Caliban her son.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Dull thing, I say so; he, that Caliban</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom now I keep in service. Thou best know'st</div>
                              <div class="line">What torment I did find thee in; thy groans</div>
                              <div class="line">Did make wolves howl and penetrate the breasts</div>
                              <div class="line">Of ever angry bears: it was a torment</div>
                              <div class="line">To lay upon the damn'd, which Sycorax</div>
                              <div class="line">Could not again undo: it was mine art,</div>
                              <div class="line">When I arrived and heard thee, that made gape</div>
                              <div class="line">The pine and let thee out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank thee, master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou more murmur'st, I will rend an oak</div>
                              <div class="line">And peg thee in his knotty entrails till</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast howl'd away twelve winters.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Pardon, master;</div>
                              <div class="line">I will be correspondent to command</div>
                              <div class="line">And do my spiriting gently.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Do so, and after two days</div>
                              <div class="line">I will discharge thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">That's my noble master!</div>
                              <div class="line">What shall I do? say what; what shall I do?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Go make thyself like a nymph o' the sea: be subject</div>
                              <div class="line">To no sight but thine and mine, invisible</div>
                              <div class="line">To every eyeball else. Go take this shape</div>
                              <div class="line">And hither come in't: go, hence with diligence!</div>
                              <p>Exit ARIEL</p>
                              <div class="line">Awake, dear heart, awake! thou hast slept well; Awake!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">The strangeness of your story put</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaviness in me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Shake it off. Come on;</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll visit Caliban my slave, who never</div>
                              <div class="line">Yields us kind answer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis a villain, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not love to look on.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">But, as 'tis,</div>
                              <div class="line">We cannot miss him: he does make our fire,</div>
                              <div class="line">Fetch in our wood and serves in offices</div>
                              <div class="line">That profit us. What, ho! slave! Caliban!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou earth, thou! speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  There's wood enough within.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come forth, I say! there's other business for thee:</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, thou tortoise! when?</div>
                              <p>Re-enter ARIEL like a water-nymph</p>
                              <div class="line">Fine apparition! My quaint Ariel,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark in thine ear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord it shall be done.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou poisonous slave, got by the devil himself</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon thy wicked dam, come forth!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CALIBAN</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">As wicked dew as e'er my mother brush'd</div>
                              <div class="line">With raven's feather from unwholesome fen</div>
                              <div class="line">Drop on you both! a south-west blow on ye</div>
                              <div class="line">And blister you all o'er!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">For this, be sure, to-night thou shalt have cramps,</div>
