                              <div class="line">Side-stitches that shall pen thy breath up; urchins</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall, for that vast of night that they may work,</div>
                              <div class="line">All exercise on thee; thou shalt be pinch'd</div>
                              <div class="line">As thick as honeycomb, each pinch more stinging</div>
                              <div class="line">Than bees that made 'em.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I must eat my dinner.</div>
                              <div class="line">This island's mine, by Sycorax my mother,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which thou takest from me. When thou camest first,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou strokedst me and madest much of me, wouldst give me</div>
                              <div class="line">Water with berries in't, and teach me how</div>
                              <div class="line">To name the bigger light, and how the less,</div>
                              <div class="line">That burn by day and night: and then I loved thee</div>
                              <div class="line">And show'd thee all the qualities o' the isle,</div>
                              <div class="line">The fresh springs, brine-pits, barren place and fertile:</div>
                              <div class="line">Cursed be I that did so! All the charms</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Sycorax, toads, beetles, bats, light on you!</div>
                              <div class="line">For I am all the subjects that you have,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which first was mine own king: and here you sty me</div>
                              <div class="line">In this hard rock, whiles you do keep from me</div>
                              <div class="line">The rest o' the island.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou most lying slave,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom stripes may move, not kindness! I have used thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">Filth as thou art, with human care, and lodged thee</div>
                              <div class="line">In mine own cell, till thou didst seek to violate</div>
                              <div class="line">The honour of my child.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">O ho, O ho! would't had been done!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou didst prevent me; I had peopled else</div>
                              <div class="line">This isle with Calibans.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Abhorred slave,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which any print of goodness wilt not take,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being capable of all ill! I pitied thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">Took pains to make thee speak, taught thee each hour</div>
                              <div class="line">One thing or other: when thou didst not, savage,</div>
                              <div class="line">Know thine own meaning, but wouldst gabble like</div>
                              <div class="line">A thing most brutish, I endow'd thy purposes</div>
                              <div class="line">With words that made them known. But thy vile race,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though thou didst learn, had that in't which</div>
                              <div class="line">good natures</div>
                              <div class="line">Could not abide to be with; therefore wast thou</div>
                              <div class="line">Deservedly confined into this rock,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who hadst deserved more than a prison.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">You taught me language; and my profit on't</div>
                              <div class="line">Is, I know how to curse. The red plague rid you</div>
                              <div class="line">For learning me your language!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hag-seed, hence!</div>
                              <div class="line">Fetch us in fuel; and be quick, thou'rt best,</div>
                              <div class="line">To answer other business. Shrug'st thou, malice?</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou neglect'st or dost unwillingly</div>
                              <div class="line">What I command, I'll rack thee with old cramps,</div>
                              <div class="line">Fill all thy bones with aches, make thee roar</div>
                              <div class="line">That beasts shall tremble at thy din.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">No, pray thee.</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">I must obey: his art is of such power,</div>
                              <div class="line">It would control my dam's god, Setebos,</div>
                              <div class="line">and make a vassal of him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">So, slave; hence!</div>
                              <p>Exit CALIBAN</p>
                              <p>Re-enter ARIEL, invisible, playing and singing;
FERDINAND following</p>
                              <h3 class="bridgehead">ARIEL'S song.</h3>
                              <div class="line">Come unto these yellow sands,</div>
                              <div class="line">And then take hands:</div>
                              <div class="line">Courtsied when you have and kiss'd</div>
                              <div class="line">The wild waves whist,</div>
                              <div class="line">Foot it featly here and there;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, sweet sprites, the burthen bear.</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark, hark!</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Burthen (dispersedly, within) Bow-wow</span>
                              </div>
                              <div class="line">The watch-dogs bark!</div>
                              <p>Burthen Bow-wow</p>
                              <div class="line">Hark, hark! I hear</div>
                              <div class="line">The strain of strutting chanticleer</div>
                              <div class="line">Cry, Cock-a-diddle-dow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Where should this music be? i' the air or the earth?</div>
                              <div class="line">It sounds no more: and sure, it waits upon</div>
                              <div class="line">Some god o' the island. Sitting on a bank,</div>
                              <div class="line">Weeping again the king my father's wreck,</div>
                              <div class="line">This music crept by me upon the waters,</div>
                              <div class="line">Allaying both their fury and my passion</div>
                              <div class="line">With its sweet air: thence I have follow'd it,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or it hath drawn me rather. But 'tis gone.</div>
                              <div class="line">No, it begins again.</div>
                              <p>ARIEL sings</p>
                              <div class="line">Full fathom five thy father lies;</div>
                              <div class="line">Of his bones are coral made;</div>
                              <div class="line">Those are pearls that were his eyes:</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing of him that doth fade</div>
                              <div class="line">But doth suffer a sea-change</div>
                              <div class="line">Into something rich and strange.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sea-nymphs hourly ring his knell</div>
                              <p>Burthen Ding-dong</p>
                              <div class="line">Hark! now I hear them,--Ding-dong, bell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">The ditty does remember my drown'd father.</div>
                              <div class="line">This is no mortal business, nor no sound</div>
                              <div class="line">That the earth owes. I hear it now above me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">The fringed curtains of thine eye advance</div>
                              <div class="line">And say what thou seest yond.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">What is't? a spirit?</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord, how it looks about! Believe me, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">It carries a brave form. But 'tis a spirit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, wench; it eats and sleeps and hath such senses</div>
                              <div class="line">As we have, such. This gallant which thou seest</div>
                              <div class="line">Was in the wreck; and, but he's something stain'd</div>
                              <div class="line">With grief that's beauty's canker, thou mightst call him</div>
                              <div class="line">A goodly person: he hath lost his fellows</div>
                              <div class="line">And strays about to find 'em.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">I might call him</div>
                              <div class="line">A thing divine, for nothing natural</div>
                              <div class="line">I ever saw so noble.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span> It goes on, I see,</div>
                              <div class="line">As my soul prompts it. Spirit, fine spirit! I'll free thee</div>
                              <div class="line">Within two days for this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Most sure, the goddess</div>
                              <div class="line">On whom these airs attend! Vouchsafe my prayer</div>
                              <div class="line">May know if you remain upon this island;</div>
                              <div class="line">And that you will some good instruction give</div>
                              <div class="line">How I may bear me here: my prime request,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which I do last pronounce, is, O you wonder!</div>
                              <div class="line">If you be maid or no?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">No wonder, sir;</div>
                              <div class="line">But certainly a maid.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">My language! heavens!</div>
                              <div class="line">I am the best of them that speak this speech,</div>
                              <div class="line">Were I but where 'tis spoken.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">How? the best?</div>
                              <div class="line">What wert thou, if the King of Naples heard thee?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">A single thing, as I am now, that wonders</div>
                              <div class="line">To hear thee speak of Naples. He does hear me;</div>
                              <div class="line">And that he does I weep: myself am Naples,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who with mine eyes, never since at ebb, beheld</div>
                              <div class="line">The king my father wreck'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alack, for mercy!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, faith, and all his lords; the Duke of Milan</div>
                              <div class="line">And his brave son being twain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span> The Duke of Milan</div>
                              <div class="line">And his more braver daughter could control thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">If now 'twere fit to do't. At the first sight</div>
                              <div class="line">They have changed eyes. Delicate Ariel,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll set thee free for this.</div>
                              <p>To FERDINAND</p>
                              <div class="line">A word, good sir;</div>
                              <div class="line">I fear you have done yourself some wrong: a word.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why speaks my father so ungently? This</div>
                              <div class="line">Is the third man that e'er I saw, the first</div>
                              <div class="line">That e'er I sigh'd for: pity move my father</div>
                              <div class="line">To be inclined my way!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">O, if a virgin,</div>
                              <div class="line">And your affection not gone forth, I'll make you</div>
                              <div class="line">The queen of Naples.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Soft, sir! one word more.</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">They are both in either's powers; but this swift business</div>
                              <div class="line">I must uneasy make, lest too light winning</div>
                              <div class="line">Make the prize light.</div>
                              <p>To FERDINAND</p>
                              <div class="line">One word more; I charge thee</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou attend me: thou dost here usurp</div>
                              <div class="line">The name thou owest not; and hast put thyself</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon this island as a spy, to win it</div>
                              <div class="line">From me, the lord on't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">No, as I am a man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">There's nothing ill can dwell in such a temple:</div>
                              <div class="line">If the ill spirit have so fair a house,</div>
                              <div class="line">Good things will strive to dwell with't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Follow me.</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak not you for him; he's a traitor. Come;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll manacle thy neck and feet together:</div>
                              <div class="line">Sea-water shalt thou drink; thy food shall be</div>
                              <div class="line">The fresh-brook muscles, wither'd roots and husks</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein the acorn cradled. Follow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">No;</div>
                              <div class="line">I will resist such entertainment till</div>
                              <div class="line">Mine enemy has more power.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Draws, and is charmed from moving</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">O dear father,</div>
                              <div class="line">Make not too rash a trial of him, for</div>
                              <div class="line">He's gentle and not fearful.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">What? I say,</div>
                              <div class="line">My foot my tutor? Put thy sword up, traitor;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who makest a show but darest not strike, thy conscience</div>
                              <div class="line">Is so possess'd with guilt: come from thy ward,</div>
                              <div class="line">For I can here disarm thee with this stick</div>
                              <div class="line">And make thy weapon drop.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Beseech you, father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hence! hang not on my garments.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, have pity;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll be his surety.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Silence! one word more</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall make me chide thee, if not hate thee. What!</div>
                              <div class="line">An advocate for an imposter! hush!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou think'st there is no more such shapes as he,</div>
                              <div class="line">Having seen but him and Caliban: foolish wench!</div>
                              <div class="line">To the most of men this is a Caliban</div>
                              <div class="line">And they to him are angels.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">My affections</div>
                              <div class="line">Are then most humble; I have no ambition</div>
                              <div class="line">To see a goodlier man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on; obey:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy nerves are in their infancy again</div>
                              <div class="line">And have no vigour in them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">So they are;</div>
                              <div class="line">My spirits, as in a dream, are all bound up.</div>
                              <div class="line">My father's loss, the weakness which I feel,</div>
                              <div class="line">The wreck of all my friends, nor this man's threats,</div>
                              <div class="line">To whom I am subdued, are but light to me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Might I but through my prison once a day</div>
                              <div class="line">Behold this maid: all corners else o' the earth</div>
                              <div class="line">Let liberty make use of; space enough</div>
                              <div class="line">Have I in such a prison.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>                It works.</div>
                              <p>To FERDINAND</p>
                              <div class="line">Come on.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast done well, fine Ariel!</div>
                              <p>To FERDINAND</p>
                              <div class="line">Follow me.</div>
                              <p>To ARIEL</p>
                              <div class="line">Hark what thou else shalt do me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Be of comfort;</div>
                              <div class="line">My father's of a better nature, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than he appears by speech: this is unwonted</div>
                              <div class="line">Which now came from him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou shalt be free</div>
                              <div class="line">As mountain winds: but then exactly do</div>
                              <div class="line">All points of my command.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">To the syllable.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, follow. Speak not for him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.4">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  Another part of the island.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  Another part of the island.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Another part of the island.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, GONZALO,
ADRIAN, FRANCISCO, and others</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Beseech you, sir, be merry; you have cause,</div>
                              <div class="line">So have we all, of joy; for our escape</div>
                              <div class="line">Is much beyond our loss. Our hint of woe</div>
                              <div class="line">Is common; every day some sailor's wife,</div>
                              <div class="line">The masters of some merchant and the merchant</div>
                              <div class="line">Have just our theme of woe; but for the miracle,</div>
                              <div class="line">I mean our preservation, few in millions</div>
                              <div class="line">Can speak like us: then wisely, good sir, weigh</div>
                              <div class="line">Our sorrow with our comfort.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, peace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">He receives comfort like cold porridge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The visitor will not give him o'er so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Look he's winding up the watch of his wit;</div>
                              <div class="line">by and by it will strike.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">One: tell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">When every grief is entertain'd that's offer'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Comes to the entertainer--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">A dollar.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Dolour comes to him, indeed: you</div>
                              <div class="line">have spoken truer than you purposed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">You have taken it wiselier than I meant you should.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore, my lord,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, what a spendthrift is he of his tongue!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, spare.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I have done: but yet,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">He will be talking.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Which, of he or Adrian, for a good</div>
                              <div class="line">wager, first begins to crow?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">The old cock.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The cockerel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Done. The wager?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A laughter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">A match!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Though this island seem to be desert,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha, ha, ha! So, you're paid.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Uninhabitable and almost inaccessible,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">He could not miss't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">It must needs be of subtle, tender and delicate</div>
                              <div class="line">temperance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Temperance was a delicate wench.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and a subtle; as he most learnedly delivered.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">The air breathes upon us here most sweetly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">As if it had lungs and rotten ones.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Or as 'twere perfumed by a fen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is everything advantageous to life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">True; save means to live.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Of that there's none, or little.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">How lush and lusty the grass looks! how green!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The ground indeed is tawny.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">With an eye of green in't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">He misses not much.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">No; he doth but mistake the truth totally.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">But the rarity of it is,--which is indeed almost</div>
                              <div class="line">beyond credit,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">As many vouched rarities are.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">That our garments, being, as they were, drenched in</div>
                              <div class="line">the sea, hold notwithstanding their freshness and</div>
                              <div class="line">glosses, being rather new-dyed than stained with</div>
                              <div class="line">salt water.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">If but one of his pockets could speak, would it not</div>
                              <div class="line">say he lies?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, or very falsely pocket up his report</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Methinks our garments are now as fresh as when we</div>
                              <div class="line">put them on first in Afric, at the marriage of</div>
                              <div class="line">the king's fair daughter Claribel to the King of Tunis.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas a sweet marriage, and we prosper well in our return.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Tunis was never graced before with such a paragon to</div>
                              <div class="line">their queen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not since widow Dido's time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Widow! a pox o' that! How came that widow in?</div>
                              <div class="line">widow Dido!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">What if he had said 'widower AEneas' too? Good Lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">how you take it!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">'Widow Dido' said you? you make me study of that:</div>
                              <div class="line">she was of Carthage, not of Tunis.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">This Tunis, sir, was Carthage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Carthage?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">I assure you, Carthage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">His word is more than the miraculous harp; he hath</div>
                              <div class="line">raised the wall and houses too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What impossible matter will he make easy next?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I think he will carry this island home in his pocket</div>
                              <div class="line">and give it his son for an apple.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">And, sowing the kernels of it in the sea, bring</div>
                              <div class="line">forth more islands.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, in good time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, we were talking that our garments seem now</div>
                              <div class="line">as fresh as when we were at Tunis at the marriage</div>
                              <div class="line">of your daughter, who is now queen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">And the rarest that e'er came there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Bate, I beseech you, widow Dido.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, widow Dido! ay, widow Dido.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is not, sir, my doublet as fresh as the first day I</div>
                              <div class="line">wore it? I mean, in a sort.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">That sort was well fished for.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">When I wore it at your daughter's marriage?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">You cram these words into mine ears against</div>
                              <div class="line">The stomach of my sense. Would I had never</div>
                              <div class="line">Married my daughter there! for, coming thence,</div>
                              <div class="line">My son is lost and, in my rate, she too,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who is so far from Italy removed</div>
                              <div class="line">I ne'er again shall see her. O thou mine heir</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Naples and of Milan, what strange fish</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath made his meal on thee?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCISCO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, he may live:</div>
                              <div class="line">I saw him beat the surges under him,</div>
                              <div class="line">And ride upon their backs; he trod the water,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose enmity he flung aside, and breasted</div>
                              <div class="line">The surge most swoln that met him; his bold head</div>
                              <div class="line">'Bove the contentious waves he kept, and oar'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Himself with his good arms in lusty stroke</div>
                              <div class="line">To the shore, that o'er his wave-worn basis bow'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">As stooping to relieve him: I not doubt</div>
                              <div class="line">He came alive to land.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, no, he's gone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, you may thank yourself for this great loss,</div>
                              <div class="line">That would not bless our Europe with your daughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">But rather lose her to an African;</div>
                              <div class="line">Where she at least is banish'd from your eye,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who hath cause to wet the grief on't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, peace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">You were kneel'd to and importuned otherwise</div>
                              <div class="line">By all of us, and the fair soul herself</div>
                              <div class="line">Weigh'd between loathness and obedience, at</div>
                              <div class="line">Which end o' the beam should bow. We have lost your</div>
                              <div class="line">son,</div>
                              <div class="line">I fear, for ever: Milan and Naples have</div>
                              <div class="line">More widows in them of this business' making</div>
                              <div class="line">Than we bring men to comfort them:</div>
                              <div class="line">The fault's your own.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">So is the dear'st o' the loss.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord Sebastian,</div>
                              <div class="line">The truth you speak doth lack some gentleness</div>
                              <div class="line">And time to speak it in: you rub the sore,</div>
                              <div class="line">When you should bring the plaster.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Very well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">And most chirurgeonly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">It is foul weather in us all, good sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">When you are cloudy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Foul weather?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Very foul.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Had I plantation of this isle, my lord,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">He'ld sow't with nettle-seed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Or docks, or mallows.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">And were the king on't, what would I do?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">'Scape being drunk for want of wine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">I' the commonwealth I would by contraries</div>
                              <div class="line">Execute all things; for no kind of traffic</div>
                              <div class="line">Would I admit; no name of magistrate;</div>
                              <div class="line">Letters should not be known; riches, poverty,</div>
                              <div class="line">And use of service, none; contract, succession,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bourn, bound of land, tilth, vineyard, none;</div>
                              <div class="line">No use of metal, corn, or wine, or oil;</div>
                              <div class="line">No occupation; all men idle, all;</div>
                              <div class="line">And women too, but innocent and pure;</div>
                              <div class="line">No sovereignty;--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet he would be king on't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The latter end of his commonwealth forgets the</div>
                              <div class="line">beginning.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">All things in common nature should produce</div>
                              <div class="line">Without sweat or endeavour: treason, felony,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sword, pike, knife, gun, or need of any engine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would I not have; but nature should bring forth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of its own kind, all foison, all abundance,</div>
                              <div class="line">To feed my innocent people.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">No marrying 'mong his subjects?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">None, man; all idle: whores and knaves.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">I would with such perfection govern, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">To excel the golden age.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">God save his majesty!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Long live Gonzalo!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">And,--do you mark me, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, no more: thou dost talk nothing to me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do well believe your highness; and</div>
                              <div class="line">did it to minister occasion to these gentlemen,</div>
                              <div class="line">who are of such sensible and nimble lungs that</div>
                              <div class="line">they always use to laugh at nothing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas you we laughed at.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Who in this kind of merry fooling am nothing</div>
                              <div class="line">to you: so you may continue and laugh at</div>
                              <div class="line">nothing still.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What a blow was there given!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">An it had not fallen flat-long.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">You are gentlemen of brave metal; you would lift</div>
                              <div class="line">the moon out of her sphere, if she would continue</div>
                              <div class="line">in it five weeks without changing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ARIEL, invisible, playing solemn music</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">We would so, and then go a bat-fowling.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, good my lord, be not angry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, I warrant you; I will not adventure</div>
                              <div class="line">my discretion so weakly. Will you laugh</div>
                              <div class="line">me asleep, for I am very heavy?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Go sleep, and hear us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>All sleep except ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, and ANTONIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, all so soon asleep! I wish mine eyes</div>
                              <div class="line">Would, with themselves, shut up my thoughts: I find</div>
                              <div class="line">They are inclined to do so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Please you, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not omit the heavy offer of it:</div>
                              <div class="line">It seldom visits sorrow; when it doth,</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a comforter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">We two, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will guard your person while you take your rest,</div>
                              <div class="line">And watch your safety.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thank you. Wondrous heavy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>ALONSO sleeps. Exit ARIEL</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">What a strange drowsiness possesses them!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">It is the quality o' the climate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Why</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth it not then our eyelids sink? I find not</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself disposed to sleep.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor I; my spirits are nimble.</div>
                              <div class="line">They fell together all, as by consent;</div>
                              <div class="line">They dropp'd, as by a thunder-stroke. What might,</div>
                              <div class="line">Worthy Sebastian? O, what might?--No more:--</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet me thinks I see it in thy face,</div>
                              <div class="line">What thou shouldst be: the occasion speaks thee, and</div>
                              <div class="line">My strong imagination sees a crown</div>
                              <div class="line">Dropping upon thy head.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">What, art thou waking?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you not hear me speak?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I do; and surely</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a sleepy language and thou speak'st</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of thy sleep. What is it thou didst say?</div>
                              <div class="line">This is a strange repose, to be asleep</div>
                              <div class="line">With eyes wide open; standing, speaking, moving,</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet so fast asleep.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Noble Sebastian,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou let'st thy fortune sleep--die, rather; wink'st</div>
                              <div class="line">Whiles thou art waking.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
