                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou dost snore distinctly;</div>
                              <div class="line">There's meaning in thy snores.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am more serious than my custom: you</div>
                              <div class="line">Must be so too, if heed me; which to do</div>
                              <div class="line">Trebles thee o'er.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I am standing water.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll teach you how to flow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Do so: to ebb</div>
                              <div class="line">Hereditary sloth instructs me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O,</div>
                              <div class="line">If you but knew how you the purpose cherish</div>
                              <div class="line">Whiles thus you mock it! how, in stripping it,</div>
                              <div class="line">You more invest it! Ebbing men, indeed,</div>
                              <div class="line">Most often do so near the bottom run</div>
                              <div class="line">By their own fear or sloth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, say on:</div>
                              <div class="line">The setting of thine eye and cheek proclaim</div>
                              <div class="line">A matter from thee, and a birth indeed</div>
                              <div class="line">Which throes thee much to yield.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus, sir:</div>
                              <div class="line">Although this lord of weak remembrance, this,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who shall be of as little memory</div>
                              <div class="line">When he is earth'd, hath here almost persuade,--</div>
                              <div class="line">For he's a spirit of persuasion, only</div>
                              <div class="line">Professes to persuade,--the king his son's alive,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis as impossible that he's undrown'd</div>
                              <div class="line">And he that sleeps here swims.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I have no hope</div>
                              <div class="line">That he's undrown'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, out of that 'no hope'</div>
                              <div class="line">What great hope have you! no hope that way is</div>
                              <div class="line">Another way so high a hope that even</div>
                              <div class="line">Ambition cannot pierce a wink beyond,</div>
                              <div class="line">But doubt discovery there. Will you grant with me</div>
                              <div class="line">That Ferdinand is drown'd?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">He's gone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, tell me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who's the next heir of Naples?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Claribel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">She that is queen of Tunis; she that dwells</div>
                              <div class="line">Ten leagues beyond man's life; she that from Naples</div>
                              <div class="line">Can have no note, unless the sun were post--</div>
                              <div class="line">The man i' the moon's too slow--till new-born chins</div>
                              <div class="line">Be rough and razorable; she that--from whom?</div>
                              <div class="line">We all were sea-swallow'd, though some cast again,</div>
                              <div class="line">And by that destiny to perform an act</div>
                              <div class="line">Whereof what's past is prologue, what to come</div>
                              <div class="line">In yours and my discharge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">What stuff is this! how say you?</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis true, my brother's daughter's queen of Tunis;</div>
                              <div class="line">So is she heir of Naples; 'twixt which regions</div>
                              <div class="line">There is some space.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A space whose every cubit</div>
                              <div class="line">Seems to cry out, 'How shall that Claribel</div>
                              <div class="line">Measure us back to Naples? Keep in Tunis,</div>
                              <div class="line">And let Sebastian wake.' Say, this were death</div>
                              <div class="line">That now hath seized them; why, they were no worse</div>
                              <div class="line">Than now they are. There be that can rule Naples</div>
                              <div class="line">As well as he that sleeps; lords that can prate</div>
                              <div class="line">As amply and unnecessarily</div>
                              <div class="line">As this Gonzalo; I myself could make</div>
                              <div class="line">A chough of as deep chat. O, that you bore</div>
                              <div class="line">The mind that I do! what a sleep were this</div>
                              <div class="line">For your advancement! Do you understand me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Methinks I do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">And how does your content</div>
                              <div class="line">Tender your own good fortune?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I remember</div>
                              <div class="line">You did supplant your brother Prospero.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">True:</div>
                              <div class="line">And look how well my garments sit upon me;</div>
                              <div class="line">Much feater than before: my brother's servants</div>
                              <div class="line">Were then my fellows; now they are my men.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">But, for your conscience?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir; where lies that? if 'twere a kibe,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twould put me to my slipper: but I feel not</div>
                              <div class="line">This deity in my bosom: twenty consciences,</div>
                              <div class="line">That stand 'twixt me and Milan, candied be they</div>
                              <div class="line">And melt ere they molest! Here lies your brother,</div>
                              <div class="line">No better than the earth he lies upon,</div>
                              <div class="line">If he were that which now he's like, that's dead;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom I, with this obedient steel, three inches of it,</div>
                              <div class="line">Can lay to bed for ever; whiles you, doing thus,</div>
                              <div class="line">To the perpetual wink for aye might put</div>
                              <div class="line">This ancient morsel, this Sir Prudence, who</div>
                              <div class="line">Should not upbraid our course. For all the rest,</div>
                              <div class="line">They'll take suggestion as a cat laps milk;</div>
                              <div class="line">They'll tell the clock to any business that</div>
                              <div class="line">We say befits the hour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy case, dear friend,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall be my precedent; as thou got'st Milan,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll come by Naples. Draw thy sword: one stroke</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall free thee from the tribute which thou payest;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I the king shall love thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Draw together;</div>
                              <div class="line">And when I rear my hand, do you the like,</div>
                              <div class="line">To fall it on Gonzalo.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">O, but one word.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They talk apart</p>
                        <p>Re-enter ARIEL, invisible</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">My master through his art foresees the danger</div>
                              <div class="line">That you, his friend, are in; and sends me forth--</div>
                              <div class="line">For else his project dies--to keep them living.</div>
                              <p>Sings in GONZALO's ear</p>
                              <div class="line">While you here do snoring lie,</div>
                              <div class="line">Open-eyed conspiracy</div>
                              <div class="line">His time doth take.</div>
                              <div class="line">If of life you keep a care,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shake off slumber, and beware:</div>
                              <div class="line">Awake, awake!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Then let us both be sudden.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, good angels</div>
                              <div class="line">Preserve the king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They wake</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how now? ho, awake! Why are you drawn?</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore this ghastly looking?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Whiles we stood here securing your repose,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even now, we heard a hollow burst of bellowing</div>
                              <div class="line">Like bulls, or rather lions: did't not wake you?</div>
                              <div class="line">It struck mine ear most terribly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">I heard nothing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, 'twas a din to fright a monster's ear,</div>
                              <div class="line">To make an earthquake! sure, it was the roar</div>
                              <div class="line">Of a whole herd of lions.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">Heard you this, Gonzalo?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon mine honour, sir, I heard a humming,</div>
                              <div class="line">And that a strange one too, which did awake me:</div>
                              <div class="line">I shaked you, sir, and cried: as mine eyes open'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">I saw their weapons drawn: there was a noise,</div>
                              <div class="line">That's verily. 'Tis best we stand upon our guard,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or that we quit this place; let's draw our weapons.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">Lead off this ground; and let's make further search</div>
                              <div class="line">For my poor son.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Heavens keep him from these beasts!</div>
                              <div class="line">For he is, sure, i' the island.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">Lead away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Prospero my lord shall know what I have done:</div>
                              <div class="line">So, king, go safely on to seek thy son.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Another part of the island.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter CALIBAN with a burden of wood. A noise of
thunder heard</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">All the infections that the sun sucks up</div>
                              <div class="line">From bogs, fens, flats, on Prosper fall and make him</div>
                              <div class="line">By inch-meal a disease! His spirits hear me</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet I needs must curse. But they'll nor pinch,</div>
                              <div class="line">Fright me with urchin--shows, pitch me i' the mire,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor lead me, like a firebrand, in the dark</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of my way, unless he bid 'em; but</div>
                              <div class="line">For every trifle are they set upon me;</div>
                              <div class="line">Sometime like apes that mow and chatter at me</div>
                              <div class="line">And after bite me, then like hedgehogs which</div>
                              <div class="line">Lie tumbling in my barefoot way and mount</div>
                              <div class="line">Their pricks at my footfall; sometime am I</div>
                              <div class="line">All wound with adders who with cloven tongues</div>
                              <div class="line">Do hiss me into madness.</div>
                              <p>Enter TRINCULO</p>
                              <div class="line">Lo, now, lo!</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes a spirit of his, and to torment me</div>
                              <div class="line">For bringing wood in slowly. I'll fall flat;</div>
                              <div class="line">Perchance he will not mind me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's neither bush nor shrub, to bear off</div>
                              <div class="line">any weather at all, and another storm brewing;</div>
                              <div class="line">I hear it sing i' the wind: yond same black</div>
                              <div class="line">cloud, yond huge one, looks like a foul</div>
                              <div class="line">bombard that would shed his liquor. If it</div>
                              <div class="line">should thunder as it did before, I know not</div>
                              <div class="line">where to hide my head: yond same cloud cannot</div>
                              <div class="line">choose but fall by pailfuls. What have we</div>
                              <div class="line">here? a man or a fish? dead or alive? A fish:</div>
                              <div class="line">he smells like a fish; a very ancient and fish-</div>
                              <div class="line">like smell; a kind of not of the newest Poor-</div>
                              <div class="line">John. A strange fish! Were I in England now,</div>
                              <div class="line">as once I was, and had but this fish painted,</div>
                              <div class="line">not a holiday fool there but would give a piece</div>
                              <div class="line">of silver: there would this monster make a</div>
                              <div class="line">man; any strange beast there makes a man:</div>
                              <div class="line">when they will not give a doit to relieve a lame</div>
                              <div class="line">beggar, they will lazy out ten to see a dead</div>
                              <div class="line">Indian. Legged like a man and his fins like</div>
                              <div class="line">arms! Warm o' my troth! I do now let loose</div>
                              <div class="line">my opinion; hold it no longer: this is no fish,</div>
                              <div class="line">but an islander, that hath lately suffered by a</div>
                              <div class="line">thunderbolt.</div>
                              <p>Thunder</p>
                              <div class="line">Alas, the storm is come again! my best way is to</div>
                              <div class="line">creep under his gaberdine; there is no other</div>
                              <div class="line">shelter hereabouts: misery acquaints a man with</div>
                              <div class="line">strange bed-fellows. I will here shroud till the</div>
                              <div class="line">dregs of the storm be past.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter STEPHANO, singing: a bottle in his hand</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall no more to sea, to sea,</div>
                              <div class="line">Here shall I die ashore--</div>
                              <div class="line">This is a very scurvy tune to sing at a man's</div>
                              <div class="line">funeral: well, here's my comfort. <span>Drinks</span>
                              </div>
                              <p>Sings</p>
                              <div class="line">The master, the swabber, the boatswain and I,</div>
                              <div class="line">The gunner and his mate</div>
                              <div class="line">Loved Mall, Meg and Marian and Margery,</div>
                              <div class="line">But none of us cared for Kate;</div>
                              <div class="line">For she had a tongue with a tang,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would cry to a sailor, Go hang!</div>
                              <div class="line">She loved not the savour of tar nor of pitch,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet a tailor might scratch her where'er she did itch:</div>
                              <div class="line">Then to sea, boys, and let her go hang!</div>
                              <div class="line">This is a scurvy tune too: but here's my comfort.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Drinks</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not torment me: Oh!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter? Have we devils here? Do you put</div>
                              <div class="line">tricks upon's with savages and men of Ind, ha? I</div>
                              <div class="line">have not scaped drowning to be afeard now of your</div>
                              <div class="line">four legs; for it hath been said, As proper a man as</div>
                              <div class="line">ever went on four legs cannot make him give ground;</div>
                              <div class="line">and it shall be said so again while Stephano</div>
                              <div class="line">breathes at's nostrils.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">The spirit torments me; Oh!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">This is some monster of the isle with four legs, who</div>
                              <div class="line">hath got, as I take it, an ague. Where the devil</div>
                              <div class="line">should he learn our language? I will give him some</div>
                              <div class="line">relief, if it be but for that. if I can recover him</div>
                              <div class="line">and keep him tame and get to Naples with him, he's a</div>
                              <div class="line">present for any emperor that ever trod on neat's leather.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not torment me, prithee; I'll bring my wood home faster.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">He's in his fit now and does not talk after the</div>
                              <div class="line">wisest. He shall taste of my bottle: if he have</div>
                              <div class="line">never drunk wine afore will go near to remove his</div>
                              <div class="line">fit. If I can recover him and keep him tame, I will</div>
                              <div class="line">not take too much for him; he shall pay for him that</div>
                              <div class="line">hath him, and that soundly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou dost me yet but little hurt; thou wilt anon, I</div>
                              <div class="line">know it by thy trembling: now Prosper works upon thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on your ways; open your mouth; here is that</div>
                              <div class="line">which will give language to you, cat: open your</div>
                              <div class="line">mouth; this will shake your shaking, I can tell you,</div>
                              <div class="line">and that soundly: you cannot tell who's your friend:</div>
                              <div class="line">open your chaps again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">I should know that voice: it should be--but he is</div>
                              <div class="line">drowned; and these are devils: O defend me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Four legs and two voices: a most delicate monster!</div>
                              <div class="line">His forward voice now is to speak well of his</div>
                              <div class="line">friend; his backward voice is to utter foul speeches</div>
                              <div class="line">and to detract. If all the wine in my bottle will</div>
                              <div class="line">recover him, I will help his ague. Come. Amen! I</div>
                              <div class="line">will pour some in thy other mouth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Stephano!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth thy other mouth call me? Mercy, mercy! This is</div>
                              <div class="line">a devil, and no monster: I will leave him; I have no</div>
                              <div class="line">long spoon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Stephano! If thou beest Stephano, touch me and</div>
                              <div class="line">speak to me: for I am Trinculo--be not afeard--thy</div>
                              <div class="line">good friend Trinculo.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou beest Trinculo, come forth: I'll pull thee</div>
                              <div class="line">by the lesser legs: if any be Trinculo's legs,</div>
                              <div class="line">these are they. Thou art very Trinculo indeed! How</div>
                              <div class="line">camest thou to be the siege of this moon-calf? can</div>
                              <div class="line">he vent Trinculos?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">I took him to be killed with a thunder-stroke. But</div>
                              <div class="line">art thou not drowned, Stephano? I hope now thou art</div>
                              <div class="line">not drowned. Is the storm overblown? I hid me</div>
                              <div class="line">under the dead moon-calf's gaberdine for fear of</div>
                              <div class="line">the storm. And art thou living, Stephano? O</div>
                              <div class="line">Stephano, two Neapolitans 'scaped!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, do not turn me about; my stomach is not constant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  These be fine things, an if they be</div>
                              <div class="line">not sprites.</div>
                              <div class="line">That's a brave god and bears celestial liquor.</div>
                              <div class="line">I will kneel to him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">How didst thou 'scape? How camest thou hither?</div>
                              <div class="line">swear by this bottle how thou camest hither. I</div>
                              <div class="line">escaped upon a butt of sack which the sailors</div>
                              <div class="line">heaved o'erboard, by this bottle; which I made of</div>
                              <div class="line">the bark of a tree with mine own hands since I was</div>
                              <div class="line">cast ashore.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll swear upon that bottle to be thy true subject;</div>
                              <div class="line">for the liquor is not earthly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here; swear then how thou escapedst.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Swum ashore. man, like a duck: I can swim like a</div>
                              <div class="line">duck, I'll be sworn.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, kiss the book. Though thou canst swim like a</div>
                              <div class="line">duck, thou art made like a goose.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">O Stephano. hast any more of this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">The whole butt, man: my cellar is in a rock by the</div>
                              <div class="line">sea-side where my wine is hid. How now, moon-calf!</div>
                              <div class="line">how does thine ague?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Hast thou not dropp'd from heaven?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Out o' the moon, I do assure thee: I was the man i'</div>
                              <div class="line">the moon when time was.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I have seen thee in her and I do adore thee:</div>
                              <div class="line">My mistress show'd me thee and thy dog and thy bush.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, swear to that; kiss the book: I will furnish</div>
                              <div class="line">it anon with new contents swear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">By this good light, this is a very shallow monster!</div>
                              <div class="line">I afeard of him! A very weak monster! The man i'</div>
                              <div class="line">the moon! A most poor credulous monster! Well</div>
                              <div class="line">drawn, monster, in good sooth!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll show thee every fertile inch o' th' island;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I will kiss thy foot: I prithee, be my god.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">By this light, a most perfidious and drunken</div>
                              <div class="line">monster! when 's god's asleep, he'll rob his bottle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll kiss thy foot; I'll swear myself thy subject.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on then; down, and swear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall laugh myself to death at this puppy-headed</div>
                              <div class="line">monster. A most scurvy monster! I could find in my</div>
                              <div class="line">heart to beat him,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, kiss.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">But that the poor monster's in drink: an abominable monster!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll show thee the best springs; I'll pluck thee berries;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll fish for thee and get thee wood enough.</div>
                              <div class="line">A plague upon the tyrant that I serve!</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll bear him no more sticks, but follow thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou wondrous man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">A most ridiculous monster, to make a wonder of a</div>
                              <div class="line">Poor drunkard!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, let me bring thee where crabs grow;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I with my long nails will dig thee pignuts;</div>
                              <div class="line">Show thee a jay's nest and instruct thee how</div>
                              <div class="line">To snare the nimble marmoset; I'll bring thee</div>
                              <div class="line">To clustering filberts and sometimes I'll get thee</div>
                              <div class="line">Young scamels from the rock. Wilt thou go with me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee now, lead the way without any more</div>
                              <div class="line">talking. Trinculo, the king and all our company</div>
                              <div class="line">else being drowned, we will inherit here: here;</div>
                              <div class="line">bear my bottle: fellow Trinculo, we'll fill him by</div>
                              <div class="line">and by again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Sings drunkenly</span>
                              </div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell master; farewell, farewell!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">A howling monster: a drunken monster!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">No more dams I'll make for fish</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor fetch in firing</div>
                              <div class="line">At requiring;</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor scrape trencher, nor wash dish</div>
                              <div class="line">'Ban, 'Ban, Cacaliban</div>
                              <div class="line">Has a new master: get a new man.</div>
                              <div class="line">Freedom, hey-day! hey-day, freedom! freedom,</div>
                              <div class="line">hey-day, freedom!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">O brave monster! Lead the way.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S Cell.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  Another part of the island.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  Another part of the island.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S Cell.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter FERDINAND, bearing a log</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">There be some sports are painful, and their labour</div>
                              <div class="line">Delight in them sets off: some kinds of baseness</div>
                              <div class="line">Are nobly undergone and most poor matters</div>
                              <div class="line">Point to rich ends. This my mean task</div>
                              <div class="line">Would be as heavy to me as odious, but</div>
                              <div class="line">The mistress which I serve quickens what's dead</div>
                              <div class="line">And makes my labours pleasures: O, she is</div>
                              <div class="line">Ten times more gentle than her father's crabbed,</div>
                              <div class="line">And he's composed of harshness. I must remove</div>
                              <div class="line">Some thousands of these logs and pile them up,</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon a sore injunction: my sweet mistress</div>
                              <div class="line">Weeps when she sees me work, and says, such baseness</div>
                              <div class="line">Had never like executor. I forget:</div>
                              <div class="line">But these sweet thoughts do even refresh my labours,</div>
                              <div class="line">Most busy lest, when I do it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter MIRANDA; and PROSPERO at a distance, unseen</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, now, pray you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Work not so hard: I would the lightning had</div>
                              <div class="line">Burnt up those logs that you are enjoin'd to pile!</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray, set it down and rest you: when this burns,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twill weep for having wearied you. My father</div>
                              <div class="line">Is hard at study; pray now, rest yourself;</div>
                              <div class="line">He's safe for these three hours.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">O most dear mistress,</div>
                              <div class="line">The sun will set before I shall discharge</div>
                              <div class="line">What I must strive to do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">If you'll sit down,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll bear your logs the while: pray, give me that;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll carry it to the pile.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">No, precious creature;</div>
                              <div class="line">I had rather crack my sinews, break my back,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than you should such dishonour undergo,</div>
                              <div class="line">While I sit lazy by.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">It would become me</div>
                              <div class="line">As well as it does you: and I should do it</div>
                              <div class="line">With much more ease; for my good will is to it,</div>
                              <div class="line">And yours it is against.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Poor worm, thou art infected!</div>
                              <div class="line">This visitation shows it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">You look wearily.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">No, noble mistress;'tis fresh morning with me</div>
                              <div class="line">When you are by at night. I do beseech you--</div>
                              <div class="line">Chiefly that I might set it in my prayers--</div>
                              <div class="line">What is your name?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Miranda.--O my father,</div>
                              <div class="line">I have broke your hest to say so!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Admired Miranda!</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed the top of admiration! worth</div>
                              <div class="line">What's dearest to the world! Full many a lady</div>
                              <div class="line">I have eyed with best regard and many a time</div>
                              <div class="line">The harmony of their tongues hath into bondage</div>
                              <div class="line">Brought my too diligent ear: for several virtues</div>
                              <div class="line">Have I liked several women; never any</div>
                              <div class="line">With so fun soul, but some defect in her</div>
                              <div class="line">Did quarrel with the noblest grace she owed</div>
                              <div class="line">And put it to the foil: but you, O you,</div>
                              <div class="line">So perfect and so peerless, are created</div>
                              <div class="line">Of every creature's best!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not know</div>
                              <div class="line">One of my sex; no woman's face remember,</div>
                              <div class="line">Save, from my glass, mine own; nor have I seen</div>
                              <div class="line">More that I may call men than you, good friend,</div>
                              <div class="line">And my dear father: how features are abroad,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am skilless of; but, by my modesty,</div>
                              <div class="line">The jewel in my dower, I would not wish</div>
                              <div class="line">Any companion in the world but you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor can imagination form a shape,</div>
                              <div class="line">Besides yourself, to like of. But I prattle</div>
                              <div class="line">Something too wildly and my father's precepts</div>
                              <div class="line">I therein do forget.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">I am in my condition</div>
                              <div class="line">A prince, Miranda; I do think, a king;</div>
                              <div class="line">I would, not so!--and would no more endure</div>
                              <div class="line">This wooden slavery than to suffer</div>
                              <div class="line">The flesh-fly blow my mouth. Hear my soul speak:</div>
                              <div class="line">The very instant that I saw you, did</div>
                              <div class="line">My heart fly to your service; there resides,</div>
                              <div class="line">To make me slave to it; and for your sake</div>
                              <div class="line">Am I this patient log--man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you love me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">O heaven, O earth, bear witness to this sound</div>
                              <div class="line">And crown what I profess with kind event</div>
                              <div class="line">If I speak true! if hollowly, invert</div>
                              <div class="line">What best is boded me to mischief! I</div>
                              <div class="line">Beyond all limit of what else i' the world</div>
                              <div class="line">Do love, prize, honour you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a fool</div>
                              <div class="line">To weep at what I am glad of.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Fair encounter</div>
                              <div class="line">Of two most rare affections! Heavens rain grace</div>
                              <div class="line">On that which breeds between 'em!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore weep you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">At mine unworthiness that dare not offer</div>
                              <div class="line">What I desire to give, and much less take</div>
                              <div class="line">What I shall die to want. But this is trifling;</div>
                              <div class="line">And all the more it seeks to hide itself,</div>
                              <div class="line">The bigger bulk it shows. Hence, bashful cunning!</div>
                              <div class="line">And prompt me, plain and holy innocence!</div>
                              <div class="line">I am your wife, it you will marry me;</div>
                              <div class="line">If not, I'll die your maid: to be your fellow</div>
                              <div class="line">You may deny me; but I'll be your servant,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whether you will or no.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">My mistress, dearest;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I thus humble ever.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">My husband, then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, with a heart as willing</div>
                              <div class="line">As bondage e'er of freedom: here's my hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">And mine, with my heart in't; and now farewell</div>
                              <div class="line">Till half an hour hence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">A thousand thousand!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt FERDINAND and MIRANDA severally</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">So glad of this as they I cannot be,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who are surprised withal; but my rejoicing</div>
                              <div class="line">At nothing can be more. I'll to my book,</div>
                              <div class="line">For yet ere supper-time must I perform</div>
                              <div class="line">Much business appertaining.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Another part of the island.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter CALIBAN, STEPHANO, and TRINCULO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell not me; when the butt is out, we will drink</div>
                              <div class="line">water; not a drop before: therefore bear up, and</div>
                              <div class="line">board 'em. Servant-monster, drink to me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Servant-monster! the folly of this island! They</div>
                              <div class="line">say there's but five upon this isle: we are three</div>
                              <div class="line">of them; if th' other two be brained like us, the</div>
                              <div class="line">state totters.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Drink, servant-monster, when I bid thee: thy eyes</div>
                              <div class="line">are almost set in thy head.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Where should they be set else? he were a brave</div>
                              <div class="line">monster indeed, if they were set in his tail.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">My man-monster hath drown'd his tongue in sack:</div>
                              <div class="line">for my part, the sea cannot drown me; I swam, ere I</div>
                              <div class="line">could recover the shore, five and thirty leagues off</div>
                              <div class="line">and on. By this light, thou shalt be my lieutenant,</div>
                              <div class="line">monster, or my standard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Your lieutenant, if you list; he's no standard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll not run, Monsieur Monster.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor go neither; but you'll lie like dogs and yet say</div>
                              <div class="line">nothing neither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Moon-calf, speak once in thy life, if thou beest a</div>
                              <div class="line">good moon-calf.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">How does thy honour? Let me lick thy shoe.</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll not serve him; he's not valiant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou liest, most ignorant monster: I am in case to</div>
                              <div class="line">justle a constable. Why, thou deboshed fish thou,</div>
                              <div class="line">was there ever man a coward that hath drunk so much</div>
                              <div class="line">sack as I to-day? Wilt thou tell a monstrous lie,</div>
                              <div class="line">being but half a fish and half a monster?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Lo, how he mocks me! wilt thou let him, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Lord' quoth he! That a monster should be such a natural!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Lo, lo, again! bite him to death, I prithee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Trinculo, keep a good tongue in your head: if you</div>
                              <div class="line">prove a mutineer,--the next tree! The poor monster's</div>
                              <div class="line">my subject and he shall not suffer indignity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank my noble lord. Wilt thou be pleased to</div>
                              <div class="line">hearken once again to the suit I made to thee?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, will I kneel and repeat it; I will stand,</div>
                              <div class="line">and so shall Trinculo.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ARIEL, invisible</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">As I told thee before, I am subject to a tyrant, a</div>
                              <div class="line">sorcerer, that by his cunning hath cheated me of the island.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou liest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou liest, thou jesting monkey, thou: I would my</div>
                              <div class="line">valiant master would destroy thee! I do not lie.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Trinculo, if you trouble him any more in's tale, by</div>
                              <div class="line">this hand, I will supplant some of your teeth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, I said nothing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Mum, then, and no more. Proceed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">I say, by sorcery he got this isle;</div>
                              <div class="line">From me he got it. if thy greatness will</div>
                              <div class="line">Revenge it on him,--for I know thou darest,</div>
                              <div class="line">But this thing dare not,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">That's most certain.</div>
