                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou shalt be lord of it and I'll serve thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">How now shall this be compassed?</div>
                              <div class="line">Canst thou bring me to the party?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea, yea, my lord: I'll yield him thee asleep,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where thou mayst knock a nail into his bead.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou liest; thou canst not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">What a pied ninny's this! Thou scurvy patch!</div>
                              <div class="line">I do beseech thy greatness, give him blows</div>
                              <div class="line">And take his bottle from him: when that's gone</div>
                              <div class="line">He shall drink nought but brine; for I'll not show him</div>
                              <div class="line">Where the quick freshes are.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Trinculo, run into no further danger:</div>
                              <div class="line">interrupt the monster one word further, and,</div>
                              <div class="line">by this hand, I'll turn my mercy out o' doors</div>
                              <div class="line">and make a stock-fish of thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what did I? I did nothing. I'll go farther</div>
                              <div class="line">off.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Didst thou not say he lied?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou liest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Do I so? take thou that.</div>
                              <p>Beats TRINCULO</p>
                              <div class="line">As you like this, give me the lie another time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">I did not give the lie. Out o' your</div>
                              <div class="line">wits and bearing too? A pox o' your bottle!</div>
                              <div class="line">this can sack and drinking do. A murrain on</div>
                              <div class="line">your monster, and the devil take your fingers!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha, ha, ha!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, forward with your tale. Prithee, stand farther</div>
                              <div class="line">off.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Beat him enough: after a little time</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll beat him too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand farther. Come, proceed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, as I told thee, 'tis a custom with him,</div>
                              <div class="line">I' th' afternoon to sleep: there thou mayst brain him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Having first seized his books, or with a log</div>
                              <div class="line">Batter his skull, or paunch him with a stake,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or cut his wezand with thy knife. Remember</div>
                              <div class="line">First to possess his books; for without them</div>
                              <div class="line">He's but a sot, as I am, nor hath not</div>
                              <div class="line">One spirit to command: they all do hate him</div>
                              <div class="line">As rootedly as I. Burn but his books.</div>
                              <div class="line">He has brave utensils,--for so he calls them--</div>
                              <div class="line">Which when he has a house, he'll deck withal</div>
                              <div class="line">And that most deeply to consider is</div>
                              <div class="line">The beauty of his daughter; he himself</div>
                              <div class="line">Calls her a nonpareil: I never saw a woman,</div>
                              <div class="line">But only Sycorax my dam and she;</div>
                              <div class="line">But she as far surpasseth Sycorax</div>
                              <div class="line">As great'st does least.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it so brave a lass?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, lord; she will become thy bed, I warrant.</div>
                              <div class="line">And bring thee forth brave brood.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Monster, I will kill this man: his daughter and I</div>
                              <div class="line">will be king and queen--save our graces!--and</div>
                              <div class="line">Trinculo and thyself shall be viceroys. Dost thou</div>
                              <div class="line">like the plot, Trinculo?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Excellent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me thy hand: I am sorry I beat thee; but,</div>
                              <div class="line">while thou livest, keep a good tongue in thy head.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Within this half hour will he be asleep:</div>
                              <div class="line">Wilt thou destroy him then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, on mine honour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">This will I tell my master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou makest me merry; I am full of pleasure:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us be jocund: will you troll the catch</div>
                              <div class="line">You taught me but while-ere?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">At thy request, monster, I will do reason, any</div>
                              <div class="line">reason. Come on, Trinculo, let us sing.</div>
                              <p>Sings</p>
                              <div class="line">Flout 'em and scout 'em</div>
                              <div class="line">And scout 'em and flout 'em</div>
                              <div class="line">Thought is free.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">That's not the tune.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Ariel plays the tune on a tabour and pipe</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">What is this same?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the tune of our catch, played by the picture</div>
                              <div class="line">of Nobody.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou beest a man, show thyself in thy likeness:</div>
                              <div class="line">if thou beest a devil, take't as thou list.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, forgive me my sins!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">He that dies pays all debts: I defy thee. Mercy upon us!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Art thou afeard?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, monster, not I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not afeard; the isle is full of noises,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sounds and sweet airs, that give delight and hurt not.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sometimes a thousand twangling instruments</div>
                              <div class="line">Will hum about mine ears, and sometime voices</div>
                              <div class="line">That, if I then had waked after long sleep,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will make me sleep again: and then, in dreaming,</div>
                              <div class="line">The clouds methought would open and show riches</div>
                              <div class="line">Ready to drop upon me that, when I waked,</div>
                              <div class="line">I cried to dream again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">This will prove a brave kingdom to me, where I shall</div>
                              <div class="line">have my music for nothing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">When Prospero is destroyed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">That shall be by and by: I remember the story.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">The sound is going away; let's follow it, and</div>
                              <div class="line">after do our work.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Lead, monster; we'll follow. I would I could see</div>
                              <div class="line">this tabourer; he lays it on.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Wilt come? I'll follow, Stephano.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  Another part of the island.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, GONZALO,
ADRIAN, FRANCISCO, and others</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">By'r lakin, I can go no further, sir;</div>
                              <div class="line">My old bones ache: here's a maze trod indeed</div>
                              <div class="line">Through forth-rights and meanders! By your patience,</div>
                              <div class="line">I needs must rest me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">Old lord, I cannot blame thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who am myself attach'd with weariness,</div>
                              <div class="line">To the dulling of my spirits: sit down, and rest.</div>
                              <div class="line">Even here I will put off my hope and keep it</div>
                              <div class="line">No longer for my flatterer: he is drown'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom thus we stray to find, and the sea mocks</div>
                              <div class="line">Our frustrate search on land. Well, let him go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to SEBASTIAN</span>  I am right glad that he's so</div>
                              <div class="line">out of hope.</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not, for one repulse, forego the purpose</div>
                              <div class="line">That you resolved to effect.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to ANTONIO</span>  The next advantage</div>
                              <div class="line">Will we take throughly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to SEBASTIAN</span>  Let it be to-night;</div>
                              <div class="line">For, now they are oppress'd with travel, they</div>
                              <div class="line">Will not, nor cannot, use such vigilance</div>
                              <div class="line">As when they are fresh.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to ANTONIO</span>  I say, to-night: no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Solemn and strange music</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">What harmony is this? My good friends, hark!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Marvellous sweet music!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter PROSPERO above, invisible. Enter several
strange Shapes, bringing in a banquet;
they dance about it with gentle actions of
salutation; and, inviting the King, &c. to
eat, they depart</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">Give us kind keepers, heavens! What were these?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">A living drollery. Now I will believe</div>
                              <div class="line">That there are unicorns, that in Arabia</div>
                              <div class="line">There is one tree, the phoenix' throne, one phoenix</div>
                              <div class="line">At this hour reigning there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll believe both;</div>
                              <div class="line">And what does else want credit, come to me,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I'll be sworn 'tis true: travellers ne'er did</div>
                              <div class="line">lie,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though fools at home condemn 'em.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">If in Naples</div>
                              <div class="line">I should report this now, would they believe me?</div>
                              <div class="line">If I should say, I saw such islanders--</div>
                              <div class="line">For, certes, these are people of the island--</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, though they are of monstrous shape, yet, note,</div>
                              <div class="line">Their manners are more gentle-kind than of</div>
                              <div class="line">Our human generation you shall find</div>
                              <div class="line">Many, nay, almost any.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>              Honest lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast said well; for some of you there present</div>
                              <div class="line">Are worse than devils.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot too much muse</div>
                              <div class="line">Such shapes, such gesture and such sound, expressing,</div>
                              <div class="line">Although they want the use of tongue, a kind</div>
                              <div class="line">Of excellent dumb discourse.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span> Praise in departing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCISCO</div>
                              <div class="line">They vanish'd strangely.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">No matter, since</div>
                              <div class="line">They have left their viands behind; for we have stomachs.</div>
                              <div class="line">Will't please you taste of what is here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, sir, you need not fear. When we were boys,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who would believe that there were mountaineers</div>
                              <div class="line">Dew-lapp'd like bulls, whose throats had hanging at 'em</div>
                              <div class="line">Wallets of flesh? or that there were such men</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose heads stood in their breasts? which now we find</div>
                              <div class="line">Each putter-out of five for one will bring us</div>
                              <div class="line">Good warrant of.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will stand to and feed,</div>
                              <div class="line">Although my last: no matter, since I feel</div>
                              <div class="line">The best is past. Brother, my lord the duke,</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand to and do as we.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Thunder and lightning. Enter ARIEL, like a
harpy; claps his wings upon the table; and,
with a quaint device, the banquet vanishes</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">You are three men of sin, whom Destiny,</div>
                              <div class="line">That hath to instrument this lower world</div>
                              <div class="line">And what is in't, the never-surfeited sea</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath caused to belch up you; and on this island</div>
                              <div class="line">Where man doth not inhabit; you 'mongst men</div>
                              <div class="line">Being most unfit to live. I have made you mad;</div>
                              <div class="line">And even with such-like valour men hang and drown</div>
                              <div class="line">Their proper selves.</div>
                              <p>ALONSO, SEBASTIAN &c. draw their swords</p>
                              <div class="line">You fools! I and my fellows</div>
                              <div class="line">Are ministers of Fate: the elements,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of whom your swords are temper'd, may as well</div>
                              <div class="line">Wound the loud winds, or with bemock'd-at stabs</div>
                              <div class="line">Kill the still-closing waters, as diminish</div>
                              <div class="line">One dowle that's in my plume: my fellow-ministers</div>
                              <div class="line">Are like invulnerable. If you could hurt,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your swords are now too massy for your strengths</div>
                              <div class="line">And will not be uplifted. But remember--</div>
                              <div class="line">For that's my business to you--that you three</div>
                              <div class="line">From Milan did supplant good Prospero;</div>
                              <div class="line">Exposed unto the sea, which hath requit it,</div>
                              <div class="line">Him and his innocent child: for which foul deed</div>
                              <div class="line">The powers, delaying, not forgetting, have</div>
                              <div class="line">Incensed the seas and shores, yea, all the creatures,</div>
                              <div class="line">Against your peace. Thee of thy son, Alonso,</div>
                              <div class="line">They have bereft; and do pronounce by me:</div>
                              <div class="line">Lingering perdition, worse than any death</div>
                              <div class="line">Can be at once, shall step by step attend</div>
                              <div class="line">You and your ways; whose wraths to guard you from--</div>
                              <div class="line">Which here, in this most desolate isle, else falls</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon your heads--is nothing but heart-sorrow</div>
                              <div class="line">And a clear life ensuing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>He vanishes in thunder; then, to soft music
enter the Shapes again, and dance, with
mocks and mows, and carrying out the table</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Bravely the figure of this harpy hast thou</div>
                              <div class="line">Perform'd, my Ariel; a grace it had, devouring:</div>
                              <div class="line">Of my instruction hast thou nothing bated</div>
                              <div class="line">In what thou hadst to say: so, with good life</div>
                              <div class="line">And observation strange, my meaner ministers</div>
                              <div class="line">Their several kinds have done. My high charms work</div>
                              <div class="line">And these mine enemies are all knit up</div>
                              <div class="line">In their distractions; they now are in my power;</div>
                              <div class="line">And in these fits I leave them, while I visit</div>
                              <div class="line">Young Ferdinand, whom they suppose is drown'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">And his and mine loved darling.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit above</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">I' the name of something holy, sir, why stand you</div>
                              <div class="line">In this strange stare?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ALONSO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, it is monstrous, monstrous:</div>
                              <div class="line">Methought the billows spoke and told me of it;</div>
                              <div class="line">The winds did sing it to me, and the thunder,</div>
                              <div class="line">That deep and dreadful organ-pipe, pronounced</div>
                              <div class="line">The name of Prosper: it did bass my trespass.</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore my son i' the ooze is bedded, and</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll seek him deeper than e'er plummet sounded</div>
                              <div class="line">And with him there lie mudded.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">SEBASTIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">But one fiend at a time,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll fight their legions o'er.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANTONIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll be thy second.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt SEBASTIAN, and ANTONIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GONZALO</div>
                              <div class="line">All three of them are desperate: their great guilt,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like poison given to work a great time after,</div>
                              <div class="line">Now 'gins to bite the spirits. I do beseech you</div>
                              <div class="line">That are of suppler joints, follow them swiftly</div>
                              <div class="line">And hinder them from what this ecstasy</div>
                              <div class="line">May now provoke them to.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ADRIAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Follow, I pray you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 4. ACT IV</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter PROSPERO, FERDINAND, and MIRANDA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">If I have too austerely punish'd you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your compensation makes amends, for I</div>
                              <div class="line">Have given you here a third of mine own life,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or that for which I live; who once again</div>
                              <div class="line">I tender to thy hand: all thy vexations</div>
                              <div class="line">Were but my trials of thy love and thou</div>
                              <div class="line">Hast strangely stood the test here, afore Heaven,</div>
                              <div class="line">I ratify this my rich gift. O Ferdinand,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not smile at me that I boast her off,</div>
                              <div class="line">For thou shalt find she will outstrip all praise</div>
                              <div class="line">And make it halt behind her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">I do believe it</div>
                              <div class="line">Against an oracle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, as my gift and thine own acquisition</div>
                              <div class="line">Worthily purchased take my daughter: but</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou dost break her virgin-knot before</div>
                              <div class="line">All sanctimonious ceremonies may</div>
                              <div class="line">With full and holy rite be minister'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">No sweet aspersion shall the heavens let fall</div>
                              <div class="line">To make this contract grow: but barren hate,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sour-eyed disdain and discord shall bestrew</div>
                              <div class="line">The union of your bed with weeds so loathly</div>
                              <div class="line">That you shall hate it both: therefore take heed,</div>
                              <div class="line">As Hymen's lamps shall light you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">As I hope</div>
                              <div class="line">For quiet days, fair issue and long life,</div>
                              <div class="line">With such love as 'tis now, the murkiest den,</div>
                              <div class="line">The most opportune place, the strong'st suggestion.</div>
                              <div class="line">Our worser genius can, shall never melt</div>
                              <div class="line">Mine honour into lust, to take away</div>
                              <div class="line">The edge of that day's celebration</div>
                              <div class="line">When I shall think: or Phoebus' steeds are founder'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or Night kept chain'd below.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Fairly spoke.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sit then and talk with her; she is thine own.</div>
                              <div class="line">What, Ariel! my industrious servant, Ariel!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ARIEL</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">What would my potent master? here I am.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou and thy meaner fellows your last service</div>
                              <div class="line">Did worthily perform; and I must use you</div>
                              <div class="line">In such another trick. Go bring the rabble,</div>
                              <div class="line">O'er whom I give thee power, here to this place:</div>
                              <div class="line">Incite them to quick motion; for I must</div>
                              <div class="line">Bestow upon the eyes of this young couple</div>
                              <div class="line">Some vanity of mine art: it is my promise,</div>
                              <div class="line">And they expect it from me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Presently?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, with a twink.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Before you can say 'come' and 'go,'</div>
                              <div class="line">And breathe twice and cry 'so, so,'</div>
                              <div class="line">Each one, tripping on his toe,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will be here with mop and mow.</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you love me, master? no?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Dearly my delicate Ariel. Do not approach</div>
                              <div class="line">Till thou dost hear me call.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I conceive.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Look thou be true; do not give dalliance</div>
                              <div class="line">Too much the rein: the strongest oaths are straw</div>
                              <div class="line">To the fire i' the blood: be more abstemious,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else, good night your vow!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">I warrant you sir;</div>
                              <div class="line">The white cold virgin snow upon my heart</div>
                              <div class="line">Abates the ardour of my liver.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well.</div>
                              <div class="line">Now come, my Ariel! bring a corollary,</div>
                              <div class="line">Rather than want a spirit: appear and pertly!</div>
                              <div class="line">No tongue! all eyes! be silent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Soft music</p>
                        <p>Enter IRIS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IRIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ceres, most bounteous lady, thy rich leas</div>
                              <div class="line">Of wheat, rye, barley, vetches, oats and pease;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy turfy mountains, where live nibbling sheep,</div>
                              <div class="line">And flat meads thatch'd with stover, them to keep;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy banks with pioned and twilled brims,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which spongy April at thy hest betrims,</div>
                              <div class="line">To make cold nymphs chaste crowns; and thy broom -groves,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose shadow the dismissed bachelor loves,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being lass-lorn: thy pole-clipt vineyard;</div>
                              <div class="line">And thy sea-marge, sterile and rocky-hard,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where thou thyself dost air;--the queen o' the sky,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose watery arch and messenger am I,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bids thee leave these, and with her sovereign grace,</div>
                              <div class="line">Here on this grass-plot, in this very place,</div>
                              <div class="line">To come and sport: her peacocks fly amain:</div>
                              <div class="line">Approach, rich Ceres, her to entertain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CERES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERES</div>
                              <div class="line">Hail, many-colour'd messenger, that ne'er</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost disobey the wife of Jupiter;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who with thy saffron wings upon my flowers</div>
                              <div class="line">Diffusest honey-drops, refreshing showers,</div>
                              <div class="line">And with each end of thy blue bow dost crown</div>
                              <div class="line">My bosky acres and my unshrubb'd down,</div>
                              <div class="line">Rich scarf to my proud earth; why hath thy queen</div>
                              <div class="line">Summon'd me hither, to this short-grass'd green?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IRIS</div>
                              <div class="line">A contract of true love to celebrate;</div>
                              <div class="line">And some donation freely to estate</div>
                              <div class="line">On the blest lovers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERES</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me, heavenly bow,</div>
                              <div class="line">If Venus or her son, as thou dost know,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do now attend the queen? Since they did plot</div>
                              <div class="line">The means that dusky Dis my daughter got,</div>
                              <div class="line">Her and her blind boy's scandal'd company</div>
                              <div class="line">I have forsworn.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IRIS</div>
                              <div class="line">Of her society</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not afraid: I met her deity</div>
                              <div class="line">Cutting the clouds towards Paphos and her son</div>
                              <div class="line">Dove-drawn with her. Here thought they to have done</div>
                              <div class="line">Some wanton charm upon this man and maid,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose vows are, that no bed-right shall be paid</div>
                              <div class="line">Till Hymen's torch be lighted: but vain;</div>
                              <div class="line">Mars's hot minion is returned again;</div>
                              <div class="line">Her waspish-headed son has broke his arrows,</div>
                              <div class="line">Swears he will shoot no more but play with sparrows</div>
                              <div class="line">And be a boy right out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERES</div>
                              <div class="line">High'st queen of state,</div>
                              <div class="line">Great Juno, comes; I know her by her gait.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter JUNO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JUNO</div>
                              <div class="line">How does my bounteous sister? Go with me</div>
                              <div class="line">To bless this twain, that they may prosperous be</div>
                              <div class="line">And honour'd in their issue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They sing:</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JUNO</div>
                              <div class="line">Honour, riches, marriage-blessing,</div>
                              <div class="line">Long continuance, and increasing,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hourly joys be still upon you!</div>
                              <div class="line">Juno sings her blessings upon you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CERES</div>
                              <div class="line">Earth's increase, foison plenty,</div>
                              <div class="line">Barns and garners never empty,</div>
                              <div class="line">Vines and clustering bunches growing,</div>
                              <div class="line">Plants with goodly burthen bowing;</div>
                              <div class="line">Spring come to you at the farthest</div>
                              <div class="line">In the very end of harvest!</div>
                              <div class="line">Scarcity and want shall shun you;</div>
                              <div class="line">Ceres' blessing so is on you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">This is a most majestic vision, and</div>
                              <div class="line">Harmoniously charmingly. May I be bold</div>
                              <div class="line">To think these spirits?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Spirits, which by mine art</div>
                              <div class="line">I have from their confines call'd to enact</div>
                              <div class="line">My present fancies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me live here ever;</div>
                              <div class="line">So rare a wonder'd father and a wife</div>
                              <div class="line">Makes this place Paradise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Juno and Ceres whisper, and send Iris on
employment</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet, now, silence!</div>
                              <div class="line">Juno and Ceres whisper seriously;</div>
                              <div class="line">There's something else to do: hush, and be mute,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else our spell is marr'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IRIS</div>
                              <div class="line">You nymphs, call'd Naiads, of the windring brooks,</div>
                              <div class="line">With your sedged crowns and ever-harmless looks,</div>
                              <div class="line">Leave your crisp channels and on this green land</div>
                              <div class="line">Answer your summons; Juno does command:</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, temperate nymphs, and help to celebrate</div>
                              <div class="line">A contract of true love; be not too late.</div>
                              <p>Enter certain Nymphs</p>
                              <div class="line">You sunburnt sicklemen, of August weary,</div>
                              <div class="line">Come hither from the furrow and be merry:</div>
                              <div class="line">Make holiday; your rye-straw hats put on</div>
                              <div class="line">And these fresh nymphs encounter every one</div>
                              <div class="line">In country footing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter certain Reapers, properly habited: they
join with the Nymphs in a graceful dance;
towards the end whereof PROSPERO starts
suddenly, and speaks; after which, to a
strange, hollow, and confused noise, they
heavily vanish</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  I had forgot that foul conspiracy</div>
                              <div class="line">Of the beast Caliban and his confederates</div>
                              <div class="line">Against my life: the minute of their plot</div>
                              <div class="line">Is almost come.</div>
                              <p>To the Spirits</p>
                              <div class="line">Well done! avoid; no more!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="line">This is strange: your father's in some passion</div>
                              <div class="line">That works him strongly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">Never till this day</div>
                              <div class="line">Saw I him touch'd with anger so distemper'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">You do look, my son, in a moved sort,</div>
                              <div class="line">As if you were dismay'd: be cheerful, sir.</div>
                              <div class="line">Our revels now are ended. These our actors,</div>
                              <div class="line">As I foretold you, were all spirits and</div>
                              <div class="line">Are melted into air, into thin air:</div>
                              <div class="line">And, like the baseless fabric of this vision,</div>
                              <div class="line">The cloud-capp'd towers, the gorgeous palaces,</div>
                              <div class="line">The solemn temples, the great globe itself,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ye all which it inherit, shall dissolve</div>
                              <div class="line">And, like this insubstantial pageant faded,</div>
                              <div class="line">Leave not a rack behind. We are such stuff</div>
                              <div class="line">As dreams are made on, and our little life</div>
                              <div class="line">Is rounded with a sleep. Sir, I am vex'd;</div>
                              <div class="line">Bear with my weakness; my, brain is troubled:</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not disturb'd with my infirmity:</div>
                              <div class="line">If you be pleased, retire into my cell</div>
                              <div class="line">And there repose: a turn or two I'll walk,</div>
                              <div class="line">To still my beating mind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FERDINAND</div>
                              <div class="speaker">MIRANDA</div>
                              <div class="line">We wish your peace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come with a thought I thank thee, Ariel: come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ARIEL</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy thoughts I cleave to. What's thy pleasure?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Spirit,</div>
                              <div class="line">We must prepare to meet with Caliban.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my commander: when I presented Ceres,</div>
                              <div class="line">I thought to have told thee of it, but I fear'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Lest I might anger thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">Say again, where didst thou leave these varlets?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">I told you, sir, they were red-hot with drinking;</div>
                              <div class="line">So fun of valour that they smote the air</div>
                              <div class="line">For breathing in their faces; beat the ground</div>
                              <div class="line">For kissing of their feet; yet always bending</div>
                              <div class="line">Towards their project. Then I beat my tabour;</div>
                              <div class="line">At which, like unback'd colts, they prick'd</div>
                              <div class="line">their ears,</div>
                              <div class="line">Advanced their eyelids, lifted up their noses</div>
                              <div class="line">As they smelt music: so I charm'd their ears</div>
                              <div class="line">That calf-like they my lowing follow'd through</div>
                              <div class="line">Tooth'd briers, sharp furzes, pricking goss and thorns,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which entered their frail shins: at last I left them</div>
                              <div class="line">I' the filthy-mantled pool beyond your cell,</div>
                              <div class="line">There dancing up to the chins, that the foul lake</div>
                              <div class="line">O'erstunk their feet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">This was well done, my bird.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy shape invisible retain thou still:</div>
                              <div class="line">The trumpery in my house, go bring it hither,</div>
                              <div class="line">For stale to catch these thieves.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ARIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">I go, I go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PROSPERO</div>
                              <div class="line">A devil, a born devil, on whose nature</div>
                              <div class="line">Nurture can never stick; on whom my pains,</div>
                              <div class="line">Humanely taken, all, all lost, quite lost;</div>
                              <div class="line">And as with age his body uglier grows,</div>
                              <div class="line">So his mind cankers. I will plague them all,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even to roaring.</div>
                              <p>Re-enter ARIEL, loaden with glistering apparel, &c</p>
                              <div class="line">Come, hang them on this line.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>PROSPERO and ARIEL remain invisible. Enter
CALIBAN, STEPHANO, and TRINCULO, all wet</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, tread softly, that the blind mole may not</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear a foot fall: we now are near his cell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Monster, your fairy, which you say is</div>
                              <div class="line">a harmless fairy, has done little better than</div>
                              <div class="line">played the Jack with us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Monster, I do smell all horse-piss; at</div>
                              <div class="line">which my nose is in great indignation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">So is mine. Do you hear, monster? If I should take</div>
                              <div class="line">a displeasure against you, look you,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou wert but a lost monster.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Good my lord, give me thy favour still.</div>
                              <div class="line">Be patient, for the prize I'll bring thee to</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall hoodwink this mischance: therefore speak softly.</div>
                              <div class="line">All's hush'd as midnight yet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, but to lose our bottles in the pool,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">There is not only disgrace and dishonour in that,</div>
                              <div class="line">monster, but an infinite loss.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">That's more to me than my wetting: yet this is your</div>
                              <div class="line">harmless fairy, monster.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will fetch off my bottle, though I be o'er ears</div>
                              <div class="line">for my labour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, my king, be quiet. Seest thou here,</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the mouth o' the cell: no noise, and enter.</div>
                              <div class="line">Do that good mischief which may make this island</div>
                              <div class="line">Thine own for ever, and I, thy Caliban,</div>
                              <div class="line">For aye thy foot-licker.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me thy hand. I do begin to have bloody thoughts.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">O king Stephano! O peer! O worthy Stephano! look</div>
                              <div class="line">what a wardrobe here is for thee!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">Let it alone, thou fool; it is but trash.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, ho, monster! we know what belongs to a frippery.</div>
                              <div class="line">O king Stephano!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Put off that gown, Trinculo; by this hand, I'll have</div>
                              <div class="line">that gown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy grace shall have it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CALIBAN</div>
                              <div class="line">The dropsy drown this fool I what do you mean</div>
                              <div class="line">To dote thus on such luggage? Let's alone</div>
                              <div class="line">And do the murder first: if he awake,</div>
                              <div class="line">From toe to crown he'll fill our skins with pinches,</div>
                              <div class="line">Make us strange stuff.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Be you quiet, monster. Mistress line,</div>
                              <div class="line">is not this my jerkin? Now is the jerkin under</div>
                              <div class="line">the line: now, jerkin, you are like to lose your</div>
                              <div class="line">hair and prove a bald jerkin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Do, do: we steal by line and level, an't like your grace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">STEPHANO</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank thee for that jest; here's a garment for't:</div>
                              <div class="line">wit shall not go unrewarded while I am king of this</div>
                              <div class="line">country. 'Steal by line and level' is an excellent</div>
                              <div class="line">pass of pate; there's another garment for't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRINCULO</div>
                              <div class="line">Monster, come, put some lime upon your fingers, and</div>
